TextBody: Dear Hagino, We are sorry to hear that Toyota received another complaint from one of their customers about black stains (claiming to be mold) that were found on a fry when opening a bag of Grand Farm shoestring fries. We sincerely apologize for this! I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 14174. Based on the pictures and the expiry date which is mentioned in the report, I confirm that this is the same issue as case number 12967. I therefore kindly refer to the explanation I gave on the 13th of February 2024, which you can find again enclosed. If you have any further question, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Subject: Frozen French Fries - Request for an offer
TextBody: Dear Thanks for your message, Few words about FMS: 1. We are agents in Israel for Socomat a Franch company which is a leasing company for Tank-Containers (pls see attached photos) 2. We are agents in Israel for XPOLogistics, a global company, we work with the Franch office in Tank-Container Operation. 3. We are agents of FMS Fairway Marine Surveyor a Dutch company active in Marine Surveys. 4. Containers & Logistics is our core business, as for myself, I am a certified container inspector a member of the Israeli Adjuster association & a member of the Israeli chamber of arbitrators. 5. We ship as freight forwarders different products which need temperature control for that purpose, we use a cold store / warehouse in Ashdod just next to the Ashdod port. 6. We do not purchase already frozen potato products, However we have a good experience in purchasing other products like wheat, raw materials for industries etc.. 7. We are checking this option of frozen French fries for one of our partners a processing company who deal with the Muslim community (population of more than 4 million people who consume such products) 8. Our internet domain is www.fms-group.co.il<http://www.fms-group.co.il> as you can see on the tank containers label on attached photos however, we have disconnected the web site to improve its security (will come back soon) 9. Our partner's customers are restaurants and Institutional Market as for distribution channels our clients have their own trucks and delivery channels. 10. The final aim is to have the product as privet label. I trust to have informed you well. With

Subject: TOYOTA COMPLAINT # 23-0832 FOR NATURAL VUT FRIES WITH STRANGE ODOR LIKE ROTTEN SMELL
TextBody: Dear Hagino, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. I have promptly registered it in our system under case number 14059. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : G22 23 138 20:44 Production day: 2023.05.18 The description of the complaint suggests that a potato was affected by wet rot. Wet rot happens when potatoes near the surface of the soil have sat in water for some time. As the name suggests this has caused the potato to rot, leading to a strong, unpleasant smell. As it can’t be seen visually, the optical sorters in production cannot detect potatoes affected by wet rot. However, these kind of potatoes crumble/disintegrate in the steam peeler or blanchers. Unfortunately, a potato that was alongside the affected potato can take on the smell as well. We do have intake tests in all our production plants to try to eliminate potatoes that have wet rot. If wet rot is detected during the quality tests at potato reception by a percentage of more than 2%, the truck will be rejected. As you know, we also conduct QA tests on the end product, whereby the product is tested regularly (every hour) by heating in the microwave. If the product is affected by wet rot, when heated, it emits a strong, pungent smell. We can then stop production, conduct further tests into production and block any affected stock. Based on the batch code, I have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for the specific batch and can confirm that no remarks about an “off smell” were noted. All quality checks on smell (both of the frozen and of the heated product) were “ok”. I therefore believe that this issue will not be widespread. Please also be assured that potatoes affected by wet rot are entirely harmless and do not pose a health risk. Unfortunately, due to the inherent nature of potatoes as a natural product, it is impossible to avoid this at all times. However, we always strive to offer you the best possible product by conducting regular quality tests. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Subject: Ref: 318549MB Customer Enquiry
TextBody: Dear Symon Thank you for your email. I am concerned to hear about your recent purchase. We strive to ensure that all products supplied to us are of a standard and quality you would expect from Farmfoods. I have today forwarded your comments to the supplier of this product for them to look into further. A photograph of the foreign object would also be helpful. In the meantime, please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience this must have caused. I would like to send you, with our compliments, a Farmfoods voucher as a gesture of goodwill. I would also like to enclose a self-addressed envelope for safe return of the mentioned object. Once received, I will forward this to the supplier to further aid their investigation. I will send this in today's post to the address provided in your email. I do hope that you will continue to shop at Farmfoods as we do value your custom.

Subject: Statement request : Sudan Red & ethylene oxide issue
TextBody: Good afternoon, I am contacting you regarding an ongoing food safety concern related to Sudan Red and ethylene oxide here in Taiwan. We require an official statement from your team. Please be aware that all products supplied to Shie Cheng must adhere to Taiwanese regulations, prohibiting the use of ethylene oxide and Sudan Red in both finished products and processes. Please share the statement at your earliest convenience, thank you. 余玥 協承食品股份有限公司 333014桃園市龜山區南上路108號 電話：(03)312-0958 傳真：(03)312-1660 手機： 0908-667787 Whatsapp: +886 908667787 Ashley Yu | Shie Cheng Foods Co., Ltd. Address: No.108, Nanshang Rd., Guishan Dist., Taoyuan City 333014, Taiwan (R.O.C.) Tel:+886<tel:+886> 3-3120958 Fax:+886 3-3121660 M: +886 908 667 787 | e. Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Hello Muhammed Thank you for the reply. I've added in the attachment a catalogue of one of our generic brands, Maestro. It's an A grade brand with the widest variety of choices. If you have any questions be sure to contact me.

Subject: Frozen French Fries - Request for an offer
TextBody: Dear Thank you for your interest in our company. At Agristo we have decided to focus on working directly with end buyers, as we believe this will provide the best value to our customers and ultimately drive the success of our business. Unfortunately, this means that we will not be able to work with intermediaries such as yourself. The reason behind this decision is that by working directly with the end buyers we can have a better understanding of the market trends and have more control over the prices and terms of the transactions. This will also allow us to have a direct relationship with our customers which we believe will be beneficial for both parties. We would like to thank you for your interest in working with us and hope that you understand our decision.

Subject: URGENT CORPS ETRANGER - 26999 pomme rosti légume
TextBody: Bonjour, Suite à une réclamation un client nous informe une anomalie sur la référence 26999 Pomme rosti legume 24G 1,5KGx6 /9KG. En effet le client a retrouvé une vis dans un rosti de légume (retrouvé par un consommateur). Le corps étranger n’ pas été gardé sur le site. La traçabilité incriminée est DLC : 05/11/2025 // LOT : D0323310 Avez-vous eu d’autres réclamations ? Quelles sont les causes de cette anomalie ? Quelles actions allez vous mettre en place ? L’incident a été transmis par le client aux services vétérinaires. Nous attendons votre retour sous 48h afin de répondre au client. Nous vous remercions par avance, Bonne journée, Cordialement, ______________________________________________ Nina MARTINEZ Adjointe QSE Service Qualité Sécurité Environnement 12 rue du bois Jacquot - ZI des sablons - 54670 - MILLERY Tél : 0383388761 n.martinez@passionfroid.fr <mailto:n.martinez@passionfroid.fr> www.passionfroid.fr <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___http://www.passionfroid.fr/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmRlZDg5M2RlMjdhYmUwNDcwZDA3NWRhNWJlOGU1NzdlOjY6ZDNiNTpkYTg5MmMzOWRmNDY0ODQ0MDIxODIwNjEyYjgyY2YwM2Q5ZGM1OWViMGM4MzBlOWYzYWMyYTZhYzg1MGE1MjUxOmg6Rg> <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://www.facebook.com/PassionFroid-Est-1667554066879726/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmRlZDg5M2RlMjdhYmUwNDcwZDA3NWRhNWJlOGU1NzdlOjY6ZmFhMjoyMDQwOGE2YTM0MjBlMzdiN2U1NjMzOTg0NThkYmQ5NWI3ZmE5ODg1NDgwMjIxNzQyMDI5ZTEyZjczMjU3OTllOmg6Rg> <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://www.instagram.com/passionfroid_groupepomona/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmRlZDg5M2RlMjdhYmUwNDcwZDA3NWRhNWJlOGU1NzdlOjY6MDhmNDo0ODU2MmUyN2IzMjg1ODQ0MTM1YTQ4ZDNmNjAyNGU4ODI2ZjFiZjkwNjhkZGMxNWZmMWE3ZDAwMGQ2YzQ3NjM3Omg6Rg> <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://fr.linkedin.com/company/pomona___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOmRlZDg5M2RlMjdhYmUwNDcwZDA3NWRhNWJlOGU1NzdlOjY6ZTQxNzoyYWY1MzkxNzVjNjhhMjNiYTE5MGIwNTk5NDkwNTI0ZjM1MTFkOTlkNWU5ZjVmNDk4Mzg5Y2I2MTc1N2JkMTkwOmg6Rg>

Valenciana Av. Alginet, 1 46460 Silla, Valencia (España) tel. 96 197 40 00 - Este mensaje y los documentos que, en su caso, lleve anexos, pueden contener información confidencial. Por ello, se informa a quien lo reciba por error que la información contenida en el mismo es reservada y su uso no autorizado está prohibido legalmente, por lo que en tal caso le rogamos que nos lo comunique por la misma vía, se abstenga de realizar copias del mensaje o remitirlo o entregarlo a otra persona, procediendo a borrarlo de inmediato. "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." con domicilio en la Avda. Alginet, nº 1, 46460, Silla (Valencia) es responsable de un tratamiento en el que son almacenados los datos personales contenidos en esta comunicación con el fin de gestionar las comunicaciones electrónicas, almacenar los correos en el histórico de comunicaciones y, si fuera necesario monitorizar el mensaje y archivos adjuntos por motivos de seguridad y prevención de virus. Asimismo, dichos datos y otros de contacto que el interesado haya proporcionado a través de su tarjeta de visita u otros medios, serán incluidos en el directorio de contactos de la entidad para mantenimiento de la relación comercial. Los interesados pueden ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, supresión, oposición, limitación al tratamiento, oposición a la adopción de decisiones automatizadas y portabilidad, revocación del consentimiento otorgado en relación con los tratamientos basados en el mismo, dirigiéndose por escrito a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada o en aquella que la sustituya y se comunique en el Registro General de Protección de Datos, o enviando un mail a la siguiente dirección delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es, adjuntando cualquiera que se a la vía de ejercicio de los derechos, fotocopia del D.N.I. La inclusión en esta comunicación de datos personales de terceros, queda limitada a datos actuales y veraces y requiere con carácter previo informar y solicitar el consentimiento a dichos terceros para el tratamiento de sus datos conforme los extremos contenidos en el presente aviso. Con el fin de mantener los datos actualizados, los interesados pueden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada cualquier variación de sus datos, así como el cese de su actividad en la entidad a la que pertenecen. - Este missatge i els documents que, si és el cas, porte annexos, poden contindre informació confidencial. Per això, s'informa a qui el reba per error que la informació continguda en el mateix és reservada i el seu ús no autoritzat està prohibit legalment, pel que en este cas li preguem que ens ho comunique per la mateixa via, s'abstinga de realitzar còpies del missatge o remetre'l o entregar-lo a una altra persona, procedint a esborrar-lo immediatament. "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." amb domicili en l'Av. Alginet, núm. 1, 46460, Silla (València) és responsable d'un tractament en què són emmagatzemats les dades personals contingudes en esta comunicació a fi de gestionar les comunicacions electròniques, emmagatzemar els correus en l'històric de comunicacions i, si fóra necessari monitoritzar el missatge i arxius adjunts per motius de seguretat i prevenció de virus. Així mateix, tals dades i altres de contacte que l'interessat haja proporcionat a través de la seua targeta de visita o altres mitjans, seran inclosos en el directori de contactes de l'entitat per a manteniment de la relació comercial. Els interessats poden exercitar els seus drets d'accés, rectificació, supressió i oposició, limitació al tractament, oposició a l´adopció de decisions automatitzades i portabilitat, revocació del consentiment atorgat en relació amb els tractaments basat en el mateix, dirigint-se per escrit a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada o en aquella que la substituïsca i es comunique en el Registre General de Protecció de Dades, o enviant un mail a la següent adreça delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es, adjuntant qualsevol que siga la via d´exercici dels drets, fotocòpia del D.N.I. La inclusió en esta comunicació de dades personals de tercers, queda limitada a dades actuals i veraces i requerix amb caràcter previ informar i sol·licitar el consentiment a dits tercers per al tractament de les seues dades conforme els extrems continguts en el present avís. A fi de mantindre les dades actualitzades, els interessats poden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada qualsevol variació de les seues dades, així com el cessament de la seua activitat en l'entitat a qual pertanyen.

Subject: Export to Mexico
TextBody: Dear Thanks for reaching out! Some additional questions: What is your business about? What is your market strategy? Do you have a website? To whom are you selling to in Mexico, so who are your customers? What is your experience in the field of frozen (potato) products? I do not really get your Excel file, what is your estimated volume (in ton/year)? Thanks for providing us with this additional info. And do not hesitate to reach out if you would have any additional questions! Kind reagards, Maxime --------------- Original Message --------------- From: francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx [francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx] Sent: 23/02/2024 01:14 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: RV: Export to Mexico Hello good afternoon, Have you been able to check on this request please? Regards F. Chessal De: francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx <francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx> Enviado: martes, 20 de febrero de 2024 5:42 p. m. Para: sales@agristo.com <sales@agristo.com> Asunto: Export to Mexico Good Afternoon, We are currently evaluating different options to import: frozen french fries, straight cut grade A (Fontaine variety), 9mm wide, Lenght 70%>50mm, and 30% < 50mm. Please find attached the excel fie with volumes and doubts. If you need me to clarify any point or provide extra information to quote please let me know or we can schedule a 20 minute meeting.
Dear Were you able to review our mail? Incase something went wrong or you are no longer interested, please let us know.

Subject: URGENT CORPS ETRANGER - 26999 pomme rosti légume
TextBody: Dear, Further investigation was requested for complaint 00014259. Below you find relevant information of complaint. An investigator needs to be appointed. Overview Complaint: - Company name: POMONA CENTRALE D'ACHAT- Reason for complaint: Foreign body-- Details for complaint: Metal-- Customer description: vijs gevonden in rosti, zie foto- Responsible party: Nazareth (P013) - AN1 Request from TS: foto van vijs in bijlage. Kan op basis hiervan bevestigd worden of vijs van onze plant afkomstig is?TS Owner: Regine LegeinLink to complaint: 00014259 Thanks for taking up this further investigation.

Dear Emiel, It’s a pleasure to meet you. Further to your request please find my short introduction to our company. We are trading company cooperating since 30year on the worldwide markets. Our headquarters is located in Cracow – south part of the Poland and our coldstore and production facilties are located in central Poland. We supply retail chains and wholesalers, processing plants and ingeneral fruit and veg in any form. We have 12 own brands and we cooperate with distribution channels. Please check our presentation movie attached and below our website. https://www.greektrade.com.pl/en/home_en/ As I mentioned on your website our customer implements new project and he will needs IQF potato slices and quarters without skin. We would like to consider 1 truck as a initial order and further forecast estimate for several truck per year. I hope to give all neccesairy set of info. Kindly advise your current availability and the offer fca.

Subject: World food / Account statement
TextBody: Hi Ximena, Please find statement in our accounts for customer World food enclosed for your information.

Dear, Thank you for your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Alginet, nº 1, 46460, Silla (Valencia <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://maps.google.com/?q=Avda.+Alginet,+n%C2%BA+1,+46460,+Silla+(Valencia&entry=gmail&source=g___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjBiY2JhNzRlMWQ4NWNiYjI5ZjYwNDhmMjM2OTFlYTEyOjY6NzVjOTphYTJjMzI4ZDI3Y2QzOGQ3MGEyNWFlY2QxNjQ5NzhjNTQ2ZGViMzhjYjdlYjMyZWMyODg2MWYzZWRiOGE1MThhOmg6Rg> ) es responsable de un tratamiento en el que son almacenados los datos personales contenidos en esta comunicación con el fin de gestionar las comunicaciones electrónicas, almacenar los correos en el histórico de comunicaciones y, si fuera necesario monitorizar el mensaje y archivos adjuntos por motivos de seguridad y prevención de virus. Asimismo, dichos datos y otros de contacto que el interesado haya proporcionado a través de su tarjeta de visita u otros medios, serán incluidos en el directorio de contactos de la entidad para mantenimiento de la relación comercial. Los interesados pueden ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, supresión, oposición, limitación al tratamiento, oposición a la adopción de decisiones automatizadas y portabilidad, revocación del consentimiento otorgado en relación con los tratamientos basados en el mismo, dirigiéndose por escrito a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada o en aquella que la sustituya y se comunique en el Registro General de Protección de Datos, o enviando un mail a la siguiente dirección delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es <mailto:delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es> , adjuntando cualquiera que se a la vía de ejercicio de los derechos, fotocopia del D.N.I. La inclusión en esta comunicación de datos personales de terceros, queda limitada a datos actuales y veraces y requiere con carácter previo informar y solicitar el consentimiento a dichos terceros para el tratamiento de sus datos conforme los extremos contenidos en el presente aviso. Con el fin de mantener los datos actualizados, los interesados pueden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada cualquier variación de sus datos, así como el cese de su actividad en la entidad a la que pertenecen. - Este missatge i els documents que, si és el cas, porte annexos, poden contindre informació confidencial. Per això, s'informa a qui el reba per error que la informació continguda en el mateix és reservada i el seu ús no autoritzat està prohibit legalment, pel que en este cas li preguem que ens ho comunique per la mateixa via, s'abstinga de realitzar còpies del missatge o remetre'l o entregar-lo a una altra persona, procedint a esborrar-lo immediatament. "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." amb domicili en l'Av. Alginet, núm. 1, 46460, Silla (València <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://maps.google.com/?q=Av.+Alginet,+n%C3%BAm.+1,+46460,+Silla+(Val%C3%A8ncia&entry=gmail&source=g___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjBiY2JhNzRlMWQ4NWNiYjI5ZjYwNDhmMjM2OTFlYTEyOjY6MWE2NTozNzExNGI4MzgwZDMzY2IzMGIxN2NkNDIxNzBmOGFlYTc0YTI1MzRlOTM0ZWU3NmY4NDkyOGFlOWQwMjU1NGUzOmg6Rg> ) és responsable d'un tractament en què són emmagatzemats les dades personals contingudes en esta comunicació a fi de gestionar les comunicacions electròniques, emmagatzemar els correus en l'històric de comunicacions i, si fóra necessari monitoritzar el missatge i arxius adjunts per motius de seguretat i prevenció de virus. Així mateix, tals dades i altres de contacte que l'interessat haja proporcionat a través de la seua targeta de visita o altres mitjans, seran inclosos en el directori de contactes de l'entitat per a manteniment de la relació comercial. Els interessats poden exercitar els seus drets d'accés, rectificació, supressió i oposició, limitació al tractament, oposició a l´adopció de decisions automatitzades i portabilitat, revocació del consentiment atorgat en relació amb els tractaments basat en el mateix, dirigint-se per escrit a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada o en aquella que la substituïsca i es comunique en el Registre General de Protecció de Dades, o enviant un mail a la següent adreça delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es <mailto:delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es> , adjuntant qualsevol que siga la via d´exercici dels drets, fotocòpia del D.N.I. La inclusió en esta comunicació de dades personals de tercers, queda limitada a dades actuals i veraces i requerix amb caràcter previ informar i sol·licitar el consentiment a dits tercers per al tractament de les seues dades conforme els extrems continguts en el present avís. A fi de mantindre les dades actualitzades, els interessats poden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada qualsevol variació de les seues dades, així com el cessament de la seua activitat en l'entitat a qual pertanyen.

Dear , Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. At Agristo we have decided to focus on working directly with end buyers, as we believe this will provide the best value to our customers and ultimately drive the success of our business. Unfortunately, this means that we will not be able to work with intermediaries such as yourself. The reason behind this decision is that by working directly with the end buyers we can have a better understanding of the market trends and have more control over the prices and terms of the transactions. This will also allow us to have a direct relationship with our customers which we believe will be beneficial for both parties. We would like to thank you for your interest in working with us and hope that you understand our decision.

TextBody: Line, Ben, Marieke, Alsel Albania heeft enkele opmerkingen zie hieronder. Kan één van jullie hierop antwoorden aub? Ook wil ik wel even vermelden dat de betalingsconditie voor deze klant 30 dagen is en we een KL bij Groupama hebben van 35K. De factuur is wel al vervallen sinds 10/02. De klant zal deze zo snel mogelijk betalen maar nog niks op rekening momenteel. Moeten we hier de betalingsconditie aanpassen naar 45d of 60d voor de toekomst of laten we dit op 30d staan? Mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Krenar Aliko [krenaraliko@yahoo.com] Sent: 23/02/2024 08:03 To: service@agristo.com Subject: RE: Alsel / Overdue invoice Hello I lost the mail it was Service not Agristo . We have take the goods at 06/02and just bagan to sell goods and taking feedback about them. Same feedback i think uou should know: 1-As i pointed before we have dificulties in market because Lutosa has very competitive prices about 10-15%cheaper on strait cuts Like 12/12and 10/10they have even 14/14 at 20%less.We have put less margin ti push but not big diferences. 1-About specialties such Dippers we sent them at same clients to replace Mccain with lower price but seems dificult bc they are complaining for quality. 2-Maestro10/10 seems small with same black spots Maestro 12/12 seems more long and no black spots Maestro 1kg seems good and competitive as it is for retail but will have not volumes like horeca. 3-So we will stay and strait cunts but need better prices as competition.The season is becaming so we are wainting for reacrion for better sales and coperation. 4-Will try to close the balance as soon as we can. Thank you Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android On Thu, 22 Feb 2024 at 14:38, Service Request <service@agristo.com> wrote: Dear Aliko, Any feedback on below email? Invoice still remains overdue in our accounts. Please let me know when we can receive payment.
Thank you very much. I'll be looking forward to your response.

TextBody: Goedemiddag, Er is een foutieve barcode gespot op folie 212250 ICE BJAR 1.08 V01/2024 bij de klant, hierdoor moet alles dringen geblokkeerd worden of even op on hold gezet worden. Alvast bedankt voor jullie hulp. * Folie die nog op stock staat moet geblokkeerd worden. @Leen Bataillie <mailto:Leen.Bataillie@agristo.com> lopend order mag aangepast worden naar folie 212682 met zelfde levering; @Lieze Demets <mailto:Lieze.Demets@agristo.com> vermoedelijk zal hoeveelheid wel hoger moeten zitten gezien de huidige stock ook moet geblokkeerd worden en we nog geen zicht hebben op wat er moet gebeuren met de ingepakte stock die we nog hebben en de stock die reeds bij de klant zit. ( 35 pallets op stock, 36 pallets reeds geleverd bij de klant, 4 in order) @Joke Deforche <mailto:Joke.Deforche@agristo.com> @Lieze Demets <mailto:Lieze.Demets@agristo.com> gelieve BOM en PV van folie 212250 op non actief te zetten en nieuwe PV aanmaken voor F/ 212682 op actief te zetten. @AW_SC_Planning <mailto:AW_SC_Planning@agristo.com> Ik zie dat er een productie gepland staat. Dit is onder voorbehoud nu, dat de printer tegen dan de nieuwe folie kan aanleveren. @AW_SC_Planning <mailto:AW_SC_Planning@agristo.com> Kunnen jullie huidige stock asap op NCP plaatsten zodat deze zeker niet word uitgeleverd tot we meer nieuws hebben van de klant of we nog mogen uitleveren. Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: Ref: 318549MB Customer Enquiry
TextBody: Dear Melissa Blair , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014268. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : B01233551245 Production day : 21/12/2023 Our production process includes numerous physical and optical elimination steps for foreign objects. Agristo continually invests in implementing best practice technical solutions to prevent foreign objects. First potatoes go through a stone remover, which operates on centrifugal forces to eliminate objects heavier than potatoes. Following the stone remover, there is a water bath to remove floating particles, and a hedgehog conveyor to eliminate leafage. The leafage adheres to the pins on the conveyor and is removed in this manner. After peeling and washing, the potatoes pass through an optical sorter to eliminate foreign objects. This is accomplished using a color camera, which identifies foreign bodies, green potatoes, and those with severe defects and diseases, rejecting them through a mechanical system. Subsequently, the potatoes are conveyed to the production line for cutting, and they undergo inspection for black parts by a second optical sorter. Any defects are rejected using compressed air. Additionally, small, dark-colored foreign bodies are detected and eliminated.. These initial steps are designed to eliminate foreign bodies from the potatoes. Unfortunately, this stone managed to evade these rejection steps. Based on the provided pictures, we can conclude that the stone likely originated from the initial feed of potatoes. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for the specific batch. [Result of Investigation] We are confident that this complaint is not widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Notre commande d'achat CL-2402130421
TextBody: Bonjour Malheureusement, nous n'avons pas encore reçu les résultats des échantillons. Plus d'informations suivront mercredi. Toutes mes excuses pour ce retard. Je vous souhaite un bon week-end. Cordialement Delphine Heyse Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 66 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Dear Mr Emiel, I trust this email finds you well. I am writing to follow up on our recent discussion regarding the quotation for frozen potatoes. As per our agreement, you had kindly committed to sending me the pricing details by until thursday. I would greatly appreciate it if you could kindly provide me with an update on the status of the quotation. Additionally, I have been attempting to reach out to your company via phone to expedite our communication process. However, I have encountered some difficulty as the individuals who have answered the calls seem unfamiliar with the name "Emiel" within your organization. Therefore, I kindly request a direct telephone number for your company so that I can establish a more efficient line of communication. Having a direct point of contact would greatly assist me in addressing any inquiries promptly and moving forward with our business dealings smoothly. Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response and the opportunity to proceed with our collaboration. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Beste Emiel, Ik vertrouw erop dat deze e-mail goed voor u is. Ik schrijf u om een vervolg te geven aan ons recente gesprek over de offerte voor diepvriesaardappelen. Volgens onze afspraak was u zo vriendelijk mij de prijsgegevens voor gisteren (donderdag) toe te sturen. Helaas heb ik de informatie nog niet ontvangen zoals verwacht. Ik begrijp dat onvoorziene omstandigheden zich kunnen voordoen, maar ik zou het zeer op prijs stellen als u mij een update zou willen geven over de status van de offerte. Daarnaast heb ik geprobeerd uw bedrijf telefonisch te bereiken om onze communicatie te versnellen. Ik heb echter wat problemen ondervonden omdat de personen die de telefoontjes hebben beantwoord niet bekend lijken te zijn met de naam "Emiel" binnen uw organisatie. Het lijkt erop dat er sprake is van een misverstand of onoplettendheid met betrekking tot mijn identiteit. Daarom verzoek ik u vriendelijk om een direct telefoonnummer van uw bedrijf, zodat ik een efficiëntere communicatielijn kan opzetten. Het hebben van een direct contactpunt zou mij enorm helpen bij het snel afhandelen van vragen en het soepel laten verlopen van onze zakelijke transacties. Hartelijk dank voor uw aandacht voor deze zaak. Ik kijk uit naar uw snelle reactie en de mogelijkheid om onze samenwerking voort te zetten. Met vriendelijke groet / Atenciosamente /

Subject: Réclamation qualité Sysco France / Litige n° 24,0785 - 2579571
TextBody: Chère Henriette, Notre service qualité a examiné l'échantillon qui correspond au code de lot de la plainte. Sur l'échantillon de rétention, il n'y a pas de décoloration comme mentionné dans la plainte. Comme notre échantillon de rétention ne présente pas de décoloration et qu'aucun commentaire à ce sujet n'a été noté dans nos fichiers journaux, nous pensons, avec toutes les informations dont nous disposons maintenant, qu'il ne s'agit pas d'un problème généralisé et qu'il est peut-être dû à une décongélation quelque part dans le flux logistique. N'hésitez pas à me contacter si vous voulez des plus amples renseignements; Cordiallement Kathleen Samyn Technical Sales Agristo nv P +32 56 54 09 44 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Subject: URGENT CORPS ETRANGER - 26999 pomme rosti légume
TextBody: Dear Mrs Martinez, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014259. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : D0323310xxxx Packaging day : 6/11/2023 The production process includes numerous physical and optical elimination steps to detect and remove foreign objects. Agristo continuously strives to invest in the latest best practice technical solutions to prevent foreign object contamination. Initially, the potatoes go through a stone remover, which operates based on centrifugal forces and effectively eliminates any objects heavier than potatoes. Following the stone remover, there is a water bath to remove floating particles, and a hedgehog conveyor that eliminates leafage. The leafage adheres to the pins that extend from the conveyor and is subsequently removed. After peeling and washing, the potatoes undergo optical sorting to eliminate foreign objects. Using a color camera, a mechanical system rejects foreign bodies, green potatoes, and potatoes with severe defects and diseases. The potatoes are then transported to the production line, where they are cut and inspected for black parts by a second optical sorter, and any defects are rejected using compressed air. Additionally, small dark-colored foreign bodies are detected and rejected. These initial steps are designed to effectively remove foreign bodies from the potatoes. Unfortunately, it appears that in this instance, a foreign body has managed to evade these steps. However, based on the provided picture and description, we are unable to determine the root cause of this issue. Could you please send this foreign object to the address provided below for further investigation? Could you inform us what material this foreign object is made of? [Address] We do apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: D&B Finance Analytics - Nieuws en waarschuwingen
TextBody: D&B Finance Analytics Datum 02/23/2024 Tijd 08:00 AM D&B Finance Analytics WAARSCHUWINGEN In deze e-mail Inbox Waarschuwingen Totaal Waarschuwingen 4 (4 Bedrijven) Informatief 2 Opwaartse trends 0 Ernstige voorvallen 2 Neerwaartse trends 0 De ernst van de waarschuwing wordt bepaald door het algemene gebeurtenistype. Dit kan betekenen dat in sommige gevallen een gebeurtenis verandering zowel negatief als positief kan zijn. Bekijk altijd de volledige details van elke gebeurtenis voordat u actie onderneemt. De door D&B verstrekte ernst classificatie, positief/negatief en gebeurtenis beschrijving worden te goeder trouw verstrekt en kunnen er niet tegen D&B worden gebruikt. Subject: URGENT CORPS ETRANGER - 26999 pomme rosti légume
TextBody: --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Regine Legein [regine.legein@agristo.com] Sent: 23/02/2024 13:59 To: n.martinez@passionfroid.fr Cc: Regine.Legein@agristo.com; DQSE-Alerte-Alimentaire@groupe-pomona.fr; Sophie.Rondou@agristo.com; c.scharinger@passionfroid.fr Subject: RE: URGENT CORPS ETRANGER - 26999 pomme rosti légume Dear Mrs Martinez, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014259. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : D0323310xxxx Packaging day : 6/11/2023 The production process includes numerous physical and optical elimination steps to detect and remove foreign objects. Agristo continuously strives to invest in the latest best practice technical solutions to prevent foreign object contamination. Initially, the potatoes go through a stone remover, which operates based on centrifugal forces and effectively eliminates any objects heavier than potatoes. Following the stone remover, there is a water bath to remove floating particles, and a hedgehog conveyor that eliminates leafage. The leafage adheres to the pins that extend from the conveyor and is subsequently removed. After peeling and washing, the potatoes undergo optical sorting to eliminate foreign objects. Using a color camera, a mechanical system rejects foreign bodies, green potatoes, and potatoes with severe defects and diseases. The potatoes are then transported to the production line, where they are cut and inspected for black parts by a second optical sorter, and any defects are rejected using compressed air. Additionally, small dark-colored foreign bodies are detected and rejected. These initial steps are designed to effectively remove foreign bodies from the potatoes. Unfortunately, it appears that in this instance, a foreign body has managed to evade these steps. However, based on the provided picture and description, we are unable to determine the root cause of this issue. Could you please send this foreign object to the address provided below for further investigation? Could you inform us what material this foreign object is made of? Agristo nv Technical Sales FAO Regine Legein Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9 8710 Wielsbeke, Belgium We do apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Nations emergentes - l'Arabie saoudite élue pour l'exposition universelle
TextBody: [https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/op/sh/SMJz09hnzmooDNOI2bJoy5W5xX88/Kchk06y0N6Ir] [https://8ee8c.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/pQSjlmXpKdWQ.png?u=7xwQLFBtniwQn1M9aEOtoNOELcJVx6S] l'Arabie saoudite, vision 2030 [https://8ee8c.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/QMffwcCFCBl0.jpg?u=7xwQLFBtniwQn8Dbj3M4yWsKAv3UFgi] L'Arabie saoudite, un nouveau cap NATIONS EMERGENTES Tél. 06 16 63 45 19 www.nations-emergentes.org<https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/SMK1E8tHeFuBnD0JYd6LnzM6593U/c4TvseWSXD-u> Paris, le 23 février 2024 Bonjour, Nous avons le plaisir de vous adresser notre numéro spécial ARABIE saoudite que vous pouvez télécharger en cliquant ici. <https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/SMK1E8tHeG13FLpGjnFptoeq3Rdk/U0383xgKyJZS> En effet, sous la direction du prince héritier Mohammed ben Salman, l’Arabie saoudite est en train de changer à toute vitesse. Elle veut devenir une société normale en faisant la promotion des femmes et en les intégrant dans l’espace professionnel. Elle va accueillir l’exposition universelle en 2030, les jeux asiatiques d’hiver en 2029 et la coupe du monde de football en 2034. Ces évènements internationaux vont lui permettre donner une nouvelle image de l’Arabie plus ouverte au reste du monde avec une société normale. Nous sommes une association qui a pour mission de faire la promotion des pays émergents auprès des entreprises en publiant une revue documentaire. Nous avons ciblé votre entreprise car elle fait du commerce avec les pays émergents. Ce spécial Arabie saoudite vous donne toutes les clés de compréhension d’analyse de ce pays car nos collaborateurs sont des spécialistes et la chambre de commerce Franco-Arabe. A bientôt, avec un spécial île Maurice prévu pour le mois de mars 2024 Excellente lecture et bien à vous Douraya ASGARALY VISITEZ NOTRE SITE<https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/SMK1E8tHeG7uhUeDuxPJzdxa1kE0/TkkJy83eysFa> NATIONS EMERGENTES 4, rue des arènes, 75005, Paris Cet email a été envoyé à sales@agristo.com Vous l'avez reçu car vous êtes inscrit à notre newsletter. Afficher dans le navigateur<https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/mr/sh/SMJz09SDriOHVCQwV70EgVjrS7ts/-FLdDMibnjOi>| Se désinscrire<https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/un/sh/SMJz09a0vkbXrHucGrA1pIcyhpW0/wcOqrA9uhLxw> [https://8ee8c.img.ag.d.sendibm3.com/im/sh/4lw8uLgXn9D1.png?u=7xwQLFBtniwQnF53rsJG8gMQ0DnSYGy]<https://8ee8c.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/SMK1E8tHeGEm9dTB67Yo5TGK02oG/xKMRMpToUTkE>

Subject: ¡Sweets & Snacks Expo Registration is Open!
TextBody: Discover the latest in sweets and snacks to elevate your business! [Big & Bold | Sweets & Snacks Expo | Indianapolis, Indiana, USA | May 13 (Preshow): Supplier Showcase | May 14-16, 2024: Show Floor & Education | May 16: Day at the track] When you want the latest and tastiest products your customers will love, there’s nothing like Sweets & Snacks Expo<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGJTNGdXRtX3NvdXJjZSUzRHJldGFpbGVyc214JTI2dXRtX21lZGl1bSUzRGVtYWlsJTI2dXRtX2lkJTNEU1NFMjQlMjZ1dG1fY29udGVudCUzRHN3ZWV0c2FuZHNuYWNrczE=&sig=ACzU4hfQn4nDYfkLKxtqDMbDtrVnXMGkTN86LVgobatb&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5697>. This is your opportunity to spice up your business with innovation and education, all while exploring mouth-watering chocolates, candies, and cookies alongside your favorite savory small bites like chips, meat snacks, and more. Begin Registration <https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGcmVnaXN0ZXIlMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNCUyNnV0bV9jb250ZW50JTNEYmVnaW5yZWdpc3RyYXRpb25idXR0b24=&sig=BoK8VUTXZXEf8mjELpDzf9g3jSNNu8KaJXfNsfeE5VbA&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5698> [Zesty Indianapolis] We’re racing toward Indianapolis for this year’s Sweets & Snacks Expo<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGaW5kaWFuYSUyRndlbGNvbWUlMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNCUyNnV0bV9jb250ZW50JTNEc3dlZXRzYW5kc25hY2tzMg==&sig=2WLjKsHxRSfB4XE4Rx7bvWDUDUgd8GN85CMJkFezXqwL&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5699>. This vibrant city will add a fresh new flavor to the world’s premier candy and snacks event. Get a taste of what Indy has to offer – great food, fun events, and some of the best attractions in the Midwest. Start Exploring <https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGaW5kaWFuYSUyRndlbGNvbWUlMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNCUyNnV0bV9jb250ZW50JTNEc3RhcnRleHBsb3Jpbmc=&sig=4TZ8FYcD8twU6Lo6PffeJdpHJoJpHZ5JTmQCy74kqSmh&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5700> [Why we love Indy 1. Convenient 2. Cost-Savvy 3. Culinary and Cultural Adventures] [What's Fresh in 2024?] Our move to Indy isn’t the only hot news for 2024! We’re making some big changes to the whole experience. [https://content.app-us1.com/9DbGe/2024/02/21/1cc80e1a-bc8c-48e3-adce-f2542f993933.png] Bigger, Better, Bolder: It’s Our Largest Show EVER Moving to Indy has given the show more space to grow. We’re on track to be almost 20% bigger, with more than 150 new exhibitors<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzc2UyNC5tYXB5b3Vyc2hvdy5jb20lMkY4XzAlMkZleHBsb3JlJTJGbmV3ZXhoaWJpdG9yLmNmbSUzRnV0bV9zb3VyY2UlM0RyZXRhaWxlcnNteCUyNnV0bV9tZWRpdW0lM0RlbWFpbCUyNnV0bV9pZCUzRFNTRTI0&sig=hj9A7cULDc4sbscxwHevzaKYao4iR3sJAt9cecXwSmh&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5701> in 2024! We’ve also consolidated the show floor into one large hall<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzc2UyNC5tYXB5b3Vyc2hvdy5jb20lMkY4XzAlMkZleGh2aWV3JTJGaW5kZXguY2ZtJTNGdXRtX3NvdXJjZSUzRHJldGFpbGVyc214JTI2dXRtX21lZGl1bSUzRGVtYWlsJTI2dXRtX2lkJTNEU1NFMjQ=&sig=36ivnxKkM8TmrqdwFfY9FccHUjrkkwLciNE287tPsdot&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5702>. This means easier navigation, a revised show schedule<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGcGxhbiUyRnNob3ctc2NoZWR1bGUlMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNA==&sig=8BCQNH1mFkpU9Ch1615XJKShkqexDPJ4dR6qXL2GvhBK&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5703>, and more opportunities to connect with exhibitors and products! [https://content.app-us1.com/9DbGe/2024/02/21/4f422624-bb96-44a8-a513-7607ffa26962.png] Recharge & Rev Up: Happy Hour & Fast Track Meet with friends at Happy Hour<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGZXhwbG9yZSUyRmhhcHB5LWhvdXIlMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNA==&sig=8eRVUsYGw1Jkbtyu4GYiLsSeeR8hCqQwGQ3E9ho9fEZT&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5704> on Wednesday evening, May 15, for complimentary beverages, plus food, games, and interactive experiences with top show brands. Want to rev up the pace even more? Preview the greatest drivers in racing with exclusive Fast Track<https://imei-mexico.lt.acemlnc.com/Prod/link-tracker?redirectUrl=aHR0cHMlM0ElMkYlMkZzd2VldHNhbmRzbmFja3MuY29tJTJGZXhwbG9yZSUyRmZhc3QtdHJhY2slMkYlM0Z1dG1fc291cmNlJTNEcmV0YWlsZXJzbXglMjZ1dG1fbWVkaXVtJTNEZW1haWwlMjZ1dG1faWQlM0RTU0UyNA==&sig=B983PsQbfz9FgghXrfc4TzwPSrTm3UZf373bpEN24thA&iat=1708699685&a=%7C%7C649187985%7C%7C&account=imei-mexico%2Eactivehosted%2Ecom&email=kUgOTpnlrlPauSyQcLCTSLeNz54Yhxcv0RhuPPTVQsRz%3AbRoQPSMAlp9EUV5gUI4c%2BRFw50aiYa6x&s=56ad2658c655145b6eecdcee12352a1c&i=1137A1217A19A5705> access for expo attendees at an official Indy 500 practice session after the show closes on Thursday, May 16. Subject: Carrier references laden 27.02.2024
TextBody: Hoi Catharina, Zoals telefonisch besproken deze morgen zou ik jou vandaag nog op de hoogte houden ivm de productie van de CHI PUNA voor Finland. Helaas zijn er onvoldoende bulken beschikbaar om 3 pallets bij te maken. We kunnen slechts 1 pallet bij maken in de loop van volgende week. En we hebben nog 1 pallet op voorraad. Zo zouden we 2 pallets kunnen laden in week 10. Is dit een mogelijke oplossing voor je? De andere pallets zouden dan voorzien worden in week 12. Mvg, Elynn Marisse Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 472 922 248 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Catharina Breewel [catharina.breewel@tomfrost.com] Sent: 23/02/2024 10:40 To: service@agristo.com Cc: beau.declerck@agristo.com Subject: RE: Carrier references laden 27.02.2024 Goedemorgen Elynn, Orderbevestiging T24053 – 437061 is op 16.01.2024 ontvangen. Bij het doorgeven van de order is aangegeven dat we wilden laden week 9 (26.02.2024). En nu blijkt dus dat er geen productie/voorraad is om te kunnen laden volgende week maar dat er pas geladen kan worden in week 13 (productie week 12) Order T24054 – 437062 staat voor laden in week 14 (?) Waarom hebben wij niet eerder bericht vanuit Agristo ontvangen dat productie pas voorzien was voor week 12? Onze klant in Finland zal dit nieuws niet appreciëren.

Subject: Zgłoszenie 98946212
TextBody: Created date: 23/02/2024 Case number: 98946212 Dear Sirs, with respect to the following claim, we kindly ask you for sending your statement to the next day at the latest. We need your response to answer our customer. Please provide the following information: results of control of retained samples with tasting traceability (+ countries of delivery) accredited analysis of the batch corrective measures * Numer zgłoszenia / Anliegennr. / case number: 98946212 * Kategoria / Kategorie / category: 3 Food | 3.1 Food Product - Complaint | 3.1.2 Sensory Issue * Powód reklamacji / Reklamationsgrund / reason for complaint: Chemical taste / smell * Data utworzenia / Eingangsdatum / created date: 22.02.2024 21:35 * Artykuł / Artikel / product: Frytki ze słodkich z * Nr artykułu / Artikelnr. / article number: 0135175 * EAN: 4056489150398 * Dostawca / Lieferant / supplier: AGRISTO * Sklep / Filiale / store: PL1317 (PL013MIM) * Termin przydatności do spożycia / data minimalnej trwałości / MHD / best before date: 17.01.2026 * Numer partii / Charge / lot number: G25 24 019 05:18 * Treść / Beschreibung / case description: Dear Sir or Madam, I am writing about the sweet potato fries from Harvest Basket, which we purchased from you. While eating, I had to spit out one of them - the fry had a terribly chemical taste and smell. I was very scared and stopped consuming it. I believe that the product may have been contaminated with something, I don't know if it is dangerous to my health. I kept the spat out French fry for possible tests. I also have some frozen product that has not been heated. Please contact me urgently. Yours faithfully Izabela Świergiel Quality Assurance Department Lidl Poland ThreadID: ref:00D58000000K3E6.5006N00000rgDXG:ref ref:00D58000000K3E6.5006N00000rgDXG:ref

TextBody: . . Our Reference BX137994 Please quote the above reference on all correspondence 22nd February 2024 Agristo N V Fao Richard Storer Old Mill Place High Street Tattenhall Chester CH3 9PX FOR THE ATTENTION OF Marlies OWN LABEL PRODUCT COMPLAINT - Chefs Essentials Straight Cut Chips 4 x 2.27kg BATCH CODE INFORMATION - 15.1.2026 A03 2401702:36 COMPLAINT DETAIL - all marked look bad & discoloured One of our customers has had reason to contact us regarding the above mentioned complaint. The sample relating to this complaint is being held at branch Should you need to contact the Booker branch, Portsmouth Direct From Customer, please ensure you quote the reference C304 -1381. We will require written acknowledgement from yourselves within 10 working days, assuring us that this matter has been received and logged for your records. Please forward your acknowledgement by Email to customer.relations@booker.co.uk or alternatively by post to Booker Cash & Carry Ltd, Equity House, Irthlingborough Road, Wellingborough, NN8 1LT. Please note This notification attracts an administration charge of £2.75 plus the customer reimbursement cost of £215.00. These charges are in accordance with our current deals and charges, linked to your trading terms. This will be invoiced at the end of our next financial period. Should you have any queries regarding the above please do not hesitate to contact me. Yours sincerely Sarah Nickels Customer Relations Tel 01933 371793 This is a confidential email intended only for the person it is addressed to. Booker may monitor and record all emails. The views expressed in this email are those of the sender and not Booker. Internet communications are not secure and therefore we do not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message. Subject: Ref: 318621JC Chicken in wedges pack
TextBody: Dear Jade Thank you for your email. I am concerned to hear about your recent purchase. We strive to ensure that all products supplied to us are of a standard and quality you would expect from Farmfoods. I have today forwarded your comments to the supplier of this product for them to look into further. In the meantime, please accept my sincere apologies for the distress and inconvenience this must have caused. I would like to send you, with our compliments, a Farmfoods voucher as a gesture of goodwill. If you would like to forward details of your address, I will get that to you as soon as possible. I do hope that you will continue to shop at Farmfoods as we do value your custom.

Subject: Carta de presentación Exposiciones y Diseño - ANTAD
TextBody: At'n. A quien corresponda: Reciba un cordial saludo, envió esta carta presentación para ponerme a sus órdenes dando a conocer nuestros servicios de diseño y montaje de stands. Con el ánimo de apoyar e impulsar la economía de las empresas participantes me pongo a la orden para cotizar tus próximos eventos. Exposiciones y Diseño es una empresa con más de 20 años de experiencia en diseño y montaje de stands para Exposiciones, Ferias y Congresos a nivel nacional; manejando sistemas diversos; Custom (madera), Octanorm (aluminio), e Institucional, entre otros. Adaptándonos a cualquier necesidad del expositor. Contamos con presencia directa: Guadalajara, Ciudad de México, Monterrey, Tijuana y Mérida. Algunos comités organizadores que confían en nosotros: * Expo MRO. * Ferreshow * Intermoda. * Mexicali Supply Expo. * Agrobaja. * Feria del Aguacate. * Expo Joya. * Entre Otros. Contamos con extraordinaria comunicación y contacto con recintos como Expo Guadalajara y Centro de Convenciones Injectronic (Cd Juárez) entre otros. [cid:image001.jpg@01DA667E.E8B48CB0] [firma] También en nuestras redes sociales: http://www.exposicionesydiseno.com/<http://track.smtpsendemail.com/9149242/c?p=bgQV7gM2z-wFU-Cco0fTXKcMarIE_5Cs84tX0aQNdPm7H3mx-32H3BjMwhyVnrGVJseJ4uvU0Z0CIUtCQzhIuivPXqVgjPZuDZiFQK9LG7dbsHwsGQsFsWdh1UXSGwlnkNJyfalZZLXgvkjzANJos5XsvmvrAbiEm6HO1epHAEbvG41sux3Bu9R4L3QuLeJ5> https://www.facebook.com/exposicionesydiseno1<http://track.smtpsendemail.com/9149242/c?p=4XmKopO8TJ0NUrFTFsfx7oMG9KDCL-8GY756PgQP3w-XrRDVyHWfhL9FHKP6VwjOSn7qIUPuQoTrAIJMjKDz25Kc7rl3GzPfSjV7VMyC2m7xGdjFVRK1X8cw8J90mfqNaRpYCmBPXf2Oa8GyU-tRXtbbrqvkiQW4dod-0T4fXPxmkusGE50iju24VoVyB6x0> https://twitter.com/exposicionesyD<http://track.smtpsendemail.com/9149242/c?p=fQ-3n_VzDp_1gMDGAvQMuFmk2FPQ93Ea-t0G-oBHKB6_MBDVnr3HmNq6XfTkfydnilWgTYNm_77ccKq7OIgoviZlI3Ydih_s4ru0GWw_3qj-uLNdMFuXWB2nIB8Ia-ZS02ht1TisQs9wWHJaJ8N_Fmrdq2kcLkOk-4nhVhL4FUv9Cb8w-e8wNxxK3uqYg-tP> https://instagram.com/exposicionesydiseno/<http://track.smtpsendemail.com/9149242/c?p=x9xCZUB6GkSjUowYVzezlSXHmdrERAgCTDjz3w9vbJXLAfShdEr93ccJ32cft5fDqfk2WocMD57pQsP0j4Cm3W_BSzKTLMnf2NQjaxBY0kXIbu1zEGsv3Hx_gHsWBWpgpzGeztuc75iD07EKC7AJCw_v3g2wWsk5NVtLqn0HoA6K-FGoH3DAJNBsVx1Ypx3v> Aviso de Privacidad Exposiciones y Diseño Guillen y Asociados S de RL de CV, con domicilio en Dionisio Rodríguez 2810, en la Colonia El Periodista, en Guadalajara, Jalisco, código postal 44430, manifiesta que cualquier información personal que pudiera recabar, es con la finalidad de proveer los servicios que presta, informar sobre cambios en los mismos y para fines de identificación, respetando lo señalado en la Ley Federal de Protección de Datos Personales en Posesión de Particulares. Para cualquier duda o aclaración de sus datos personales, así como para conocer el contenido integral del aviso de privacidad, lo podrá hacer consultando la página www.exposicionesydiseno.com<http://track.smtpsendemail.com/9149242/c?p=s2p03v2p4TjM7LQVHxtEm5KKgjBk49DeAcYPvgHSewXj2NNLrj29n9wYgW01foWXS93RvgLSb_L24jyGn9t7EwHaygwK4pOU578-Sf8aNpGU310UIZrk062v7dqnvZzu3ls4Acgu2Yij49_u_gO4CEXrk68tzpbDhKxfHVJKKCGIbLsQoBmGaEd99-i4NoH4> o mediante correo electrónico dirigido a aviso@exposicionesydiseno.com<mailto:aviso@exposicionesydiseno.com> Se entiende que ha otorgado su consentimiento a la transferencia de sus datos personales, si no manifiesta oposición a que los mismos sean transferidos. Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 23.02.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 23.02.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Subject: New PO. 00201/24 - 00202/24  - 00203/24 - 00204/24 - 00205/24 - 00206/24 - COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA
TextBody: Dear , Please find attached: • P.O. 00201/24 - 00202/24 - 00203/24 - 00204/24 - 00205/24 - 00206/24 - 6 x 40' fcl - FOB ANTUERPIA + PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Shipment WEEK 11 (11/03 - 17/03/24 ) Please send us PROFORMA INVOICE for approval. Note below important details: • It’s mandatory to place some cartons per item and per lot near the container door for inspection purposes. • If it’s a container reefer, it’s mandatory to have at least 1 thermographs (monitors SENSITECH), next to the container door. It must be programmed to register 120 days. • Send the shipping advice/report including information and photos of loading in order to check the condition of the goods and container before loaded. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. Please follow the below instructions for shipping documents: INVOICE / PROFORMA BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 There is some mandatory information to be mentioned on INVOICE/PROFORMA: • Detailed Description of Goods in Portuguese and English: • Full Producer details: • Country of Origin, Shipment and Purchase: • Total Net Quantity: • Total Gross Quantity: • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Payment Terms: 60 DD • Loading Port: ANTUERPIA • Unloading Port: PARANAGUA, PR-BRASIL • Incoterm: FOB • Exporter Bank Details • Must be always stamped and signed by hand by AGRISTO N.V. • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. Only to be added on INVOICE: • Production's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Expiry's date: DD/MM/YYYY • Lot Number: • If importer has a Purchase Order No. (reference no.) please include it. • Date of Invoice must be before or the same as date mentioned in the bill of landing; • It is necessary mentioning FOB price + Freight Rate = CFR price or FOB price + Freight Rate + Insurance Cost = CIF price. • The freight rates mentioned in Purchases Orders and Proformas are an estimated freight. In the original invoice, mention the freight exactly as it appears in the Bill of Landing. BILL OF LANDING - OBS: Report FREE-TIME and perdiem. CONSIGNEE: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 • NCM code – only the 4 first digits • Include CBM (m³) in the B/L. • On the fields Consignee and Notify, please DON’T use the sentence "TO THE ORDER OF". • It must inform the existence or not of wooden package. • Include the thermograph number in B/L. • Please inform how many days of free time will be given by the shipping company. • Issue 3 set of B/L and one might be used for the bank, one might be used to send to the consignee, one might be kept with the shipper, for safety reasons, as it is not necessary to release the load. PACKING LIST Must be always stamped and signed by AGRISTO N.V. BUYER / IMPORTED BY: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 NOTIFY/ADQUIRENTE PAGADOR: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 CERTIFICATE OF ORIGIN/ ANALYSIS / ANALYSIS MICROBIOLOGICAL / LOT DECLARATION + OTHER CERTIFICATES • Analysis – Always with the same date as BL, or before. THOSE DOCUMENTS MUST BE ISSUED ONLY IN NAME OF: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 All documents must be sent to us by e-mail for approval, before sending the originals. Please do not issue any original without our approval. It is very important to send all originals of shipping documents before the arrival of the vessel, the originals must be on this side at least 5 days before ETA, in order to avoid unnecessary storage expenses and/or penalty fees due to delay of sending originals. Collection letter to the bank must be made in name of COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL CNPJ:76.093.731/0001-90 Send to below bank address: COPACOL-COOPERATIVA AGROINDUSTRIAL CONSOLATA R DES MUNHOZ DE MELLO, 176 SALA CAFELANDIA PR 85415-000 BRASIL

Subject: Agristo 303 Purchase Order
TextBody: Hi Elynn, good morning😊 I am attaching our purchase order # 1786, representing Agristo 303, which is schedule to sail onboard the vessel, CMA-CGM America, Thursday March 7th , 2024, and arrive in Kingston, Jamaica on Monday March 25th, 2024 . We would appreciate if you would send us your order confirmation, confirming shipping details, also, a draft copy or copies, of the EUR.1 Certificates for our review, at your earliest convenience. Just a reminder to remove any mention of Holland or Netherlands from certain items on your invoices, as being the country of origin and replace it with EU. Please request that customs enter the container number, or the invoice number(s) on the EUR.1 Certificate’(s), as this is a requirement to qualify as a valid document in Jamaica. Stay safe, be blessed.

Subject: FW: Re: Agristo/ Cypruz Froz/ 1st order FROZorder01
TextBody: Thanks alot received On Fri, 23 Feb 2024, 5:14 pm Service Request, <service@agristo.com<mailto:service@agristo.com>> wrote: Good day Chris Unfortunately, I could not send you the pro forma yet. We know this is urgent, there is 1 last minor step to be done - so I hope and will try to send you the PI on monday before noon :) Wishing you a nice weekend

Hi Emiel, Sorry for the late reply. Would you be able to share the contact information for the distributor in Japan? We are going to be opening in Okinawa, Japan. Respectfully, Mitch On Feb 20, 2024, at 23:50, Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> wrote: Hello Mitchell I apolegize for the late mail back. Unfortunately, the amount would be to little for us to be able to ship to you in Japan. I've contacted my colleage who oversees the sales in japan with the question if tehre is any distributor we can get you in contact with. Hopefully i get a reply back soon. One last question, could you specify what area in japan you are active in?

Subject: Pesquera del Mar / 32-AGR-155 / Documents
TextBody: Hi Elynn How are you? Please amend the breakdown of the invoice. Additionally you can confirm the number of Container, because I have checked the Hapag Lloyd tracking and it cannot find the unit. Muchas gracias, /

First of all, we apologize for responding late, but our intention to contact you is because we work in the food industry and we want to offer your products as another option for the fast food chains to which we supply sauces and others. El El mar, feb 20, 2024 a la(s) 3:58 a.m., Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> escribió: Dear, Thank you for your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: Your Sainsbury's Product Related Customer Complaints - Daily Email 24.02.2024
TextBody: Dear Supplier, These are all the customer complaints for your product that we received in store, were logged via our Careline or were allocated to you by our Oscar Trading Team yesterday 24.02.2024. These complaints may be in a status of approved (approved for charging), rejected (rejected from charging) or pending review (awaiting review by the Oscar Trading Team). This report should be used as an ‘early warning’ of any issues relating to your products. This report may not list all the complaints for your products or all those that you will be charged for at the end of the period. This is because cases are still being checked by the system at the time that the report is generated and these cases, once checked and assigned, will report either in the next weekly report, or the period end report. The period end report will be the full and final list of all trading cases generated and allocated to your supplier number for this financial period. ***Please note, upon opening the attachment you may be presented with a popup stating that the file is corrupt or unsafe. This popup appears as a precaution because this email is generated automatically, however you can trust that the attachment is neither corrupt nor unsafe. To dismiss the popup and open the file, click ‘Yes’ on the popup.*** Please note that this mailbox (Trading.service) is not manned; please do not respond to it. If you have any queries, please contact Oscar.Trading@sainsburys.co.uk, quoting the Trading Case Number as soon as possible after receipt of this email.

Bij recente order T23210 is ook al een en ander misgegaan en nu weer..... Als ze de 2 pallets Mashed Potato toch willen komen laden, dan graag eind deze week en niet in week 10.

Subject: Export to Mexico
TextBody: Hello Maxine, thank you for your response. Please find more information about us in: https://www.cobybajio.com.mx/ For frozen potato french fries we are focused in food service (supplied by Simplot) and we are starting to develop the business in retail with a differentiated go to market strategy focused in value for money products and an extreme low-cost high-efficient supply chain. We will be needing only (to start as a pilot) 2 skus the 500 grams potato bag and 1 kg potato potato SKU ( frozen french fries, straight cut grade A (Fontaine variety), 9mm wide, Lenght 70%>50mm, and 30% < 50mm) Our projected volume is to be growing in 5 years with our client (2000 Points of Sales (current) to 12000 Points of sales in 5 years, they are currently selling 2.7 billion usd and they have sold 500 million USD in NYSE in 2 days 2 weeks ago). We also expect to be adding new retail clients. We have a strong C-Level relationship with our current client. I am attaching the excel file updated with the yearly projection just for our current client. [cid:5deedbb8-e615-47b1-8ae9-ca0543535987] Could you please send us your quote with the answer to the questions in the .XLSX fiel to analyze it and then arrange a call? Regards F. Chessal ________________________________ De: Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> Enviado: viernes, 23 de febrero de 2024 4:03 a. m. Para: francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx <francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx> Asunto: RE: RV: Export to Mexico Dear Thanks for reaching out! Some additional questions: * What is your business about? What is your market strategy? Do you have a website? * To whom are you selling to in Mexico, so who are your customers? * What is your experience in the field of frozen (potato) products? * I do not really get your Excel file, what is your estimated volume (in ton/year)? Thanks for providing us with this additional info. And do not hesitate to reach out if you would have any additional questions! Kind reagards, Maxime --------------- Original Message --------------- From: francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx [francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx] Sent: 23/02/2024 01:14 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: RV: Export to Mexico Hello good afternoon, Have you been able to check on this request please? Regards F. Chessal ________________________________ De: francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx <francisco.chessal@cobybajio.com.mx> Enviado: martes, 20 de febrero de 2024 5:42 p. m. Para: sales@agristo.com <sales@agristo.com> Asunto: Export to Mexico Good Afternoon, We are currently evaluating different options to import: frozen french fries, straight cut grade A (Fontaine variety), 9mm wide, Lenght 70%>50mm, and 30% < 50mm. Please find attached the excel fie with volumes and doubts. If you need me to clarify any point or provide extra information to quote please let me know or we can schedule a 20 minute meeting.

Subject: Agristo // DICPO009173 ( FOODCRAFT ) ,  1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta  , Indonesia ) -  Requested ETA : 25/06/2024
TextBody: Dear Evelyn , Please find attached new orders DICPO009173 -1 for your kind perusal. Kindly assist to counter sign and return us a copy for our filing purpose. Based on Indonesia regulation (BPOM Regulation 27/2022), food product must have at least 2/3 remaining shelf life when imported to Indonesia. Hence , we regret to inform that we cannot accept for the current active stock for both Crinkle Cut Fries and French Fries Shoestring. We seek for your kind understanding and look forward to receive Proforma Invoice for VO application. Meantime , please keep us update Cargo Readiness for our shipment booking purpose. Documents Require : 1) Invoice 2) Packing list (with production and expiry date) 3) BL / Seaway Bill (provided by our agent for FCA term) 4) Certificate of Origin 5) Health Certificate 6) Certificate of Analysis complete with Heavy Metals and Microbiological Analysis 7) Packing Declaration 8) Halal Certificate 9) Material Safety Data Sheet ( MSDS ) 10) Mandatory Inspection By SGS Before Stuffing Thank you. [A close up of a computer Description automatically generated] [cid:image005.png@01DA6896.9F99A280] [A white background with black text Description automatically generated]

Subject: Follow us on social media!
TextBody: 26 - 28 Jun 2024, Sands Expo & Convention Centre, Singapore View this email in your browser<https://mailchi.mp/iegasia/follow-us?e=ac08d24560> Follow us in our F&B and Ho.Re.Ca. foodservice journey! [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/6ac8088e-b7cb-1d79-c551-a0d56104b053.png]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=32d6fe26b5&e=ac08d24560> [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/824127a8-553e-6183-5eb3-6fa7b837a9c8.png] Co-located with [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/5509c4f2-6dab-9531-aeee-e2666c6b077d.png] 26 - 28 June 2024 Halls D, E & F - Basement 2 Sands Expo & Convention Centre - Singapore Dear Moustafa Dessouki, Get ready for a F&B and Ho.Re.Ca. foodservice journey like never before! We are thrilled to invite you to join us at SIGEP Asia and Restaurant Asia, co-located with Speciality Food & Drinks Asia, Speciality Coffee & Tea Asia and Food2Go Asia - the unmissable boutique event celebrating the best in F&B and Ho.Re.Ca. foodservice. To ensure you don’t miss out on any exciting updates, exclusive behind-the-scenes content and insider insights, we invite you to follow our socials. Let’s connect, engage and make our journey magic together! Click below to follow us now! [Facebook icon]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=26324ed1a7&e=ac08d24560> [Instagram icon] <https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=eeb7d98f85&e=ac08d24560> [LinkedIn icon] <https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=9bd6dc6664&e=ac08d24560> [Website icon] <https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=9512bc2b60&e=ac08d24560> Spread the word and invite your colleagues, friends and follow food enthusiasts to join our social media family - the more, the merrier! Your support means the world to us, and we can’t wait to share this with you. Why should you follow? * Sneak peeks into the preparations, stunning displays and innovative offerings that await you * Enjoy exclusive content, exhibitor spotlights and insider stories * Stay updated on the latest trends, demos and key highlights as they unfold [SIGEP Asia, Restaurant Asia 2024]<https://iegasia.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab&id=af1ed9eb26&e=ac08d24560> Presenting 5 shows, 10 thematic zones & pavilions catering to all key aspects of the F&B industry! [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/86a10a2b-ef69-cc53-1b22-ef0b4e1358ee.png] Food & Beverage | Specialty Coffee & Tea | GO Meat-Free Pavilion | Bakery & Pizza | Gelato, Pastry & Chocolate | Technology & Innovation Pavilion | Technology Kitchen Showcase | Ho.Re.Ca. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/a5292165-ba1d-ac54-e049-817f37a37f52.jpeg] Staged by the Singapore Coffee Association, the Singapore National Coffee Championships will be held during the event! The winner will represent Singapore in the World Barista Champsionships 2025. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/27095b66-7248-1769-a111-ca6a3664fa78.png] Step into the future of Ho.Re.Ca. at the Technology Innovation Pavilion, where leading tech companies converge to unveil their groundbreaking solutions tailored to meet the diverse needs of the Ho.Re.Ca industry. [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/f6c17d15-c827-793c-603e-2ad6392050b4.png] [https://mcusercontent.com/ab5e9391dc9367c61f80085ab/images/07fb57ab-9c5d-f49e-7821-7909476d7d42.jpeg] Discover the GO Meat-Free Pavilion, promoting a meat-free diet and environment through latest mobile technologies to provide technologies, as well as a buzzing digital marketplace for all non-meat related business partners and merchants.

We wanted to remind you that the deadline for the early bird discount for Wellness Food Japan is approaching fast, set for the end of next month. As interest in reserving booths continues to grow, we encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible if you're considering exhibiting. We look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you and make this exhibition a resounding success. Please confirm loading on the 6-7-8 march. 7th of March will be exactly 1 month from the date we set the order. Please confirm as soon as possible. It will be much harder to find a truck in the end of the week, so I hope you will confirm till Wednesday afternoon. Many thanks in advance. Rodion Shurlepov Deputy Head of Import Department Заместитель руководителя отдела ВЭД Office: +7 495 232 27 87 ext 1318 e-mail: r.shurlepov@importlogistik.ru<mailto:r.shurlepov@importlogistik.ru>; ved@importlogisik.ru<mailto:ved@importlogisik.ru> From: Service Request <service@agristo.com> Sent: Friday, February 23, 2024 1:26 PM To: Shurlepov Rodion <r.shurlepov@importlogistik.ru> Subject: RE: 144R - Order Importlogistik - pickup week 8 Hello Rodion Unfortunately we had to postpone the shipment of this order with one week, so right now it looks like the earliest possible loading date will be on March 11th. I will keep you posted in any case.
