Subject: Zgłoszenie 98946212
TextBody: Dear, We have well received your below notification, which has been registered in our system as reference ID 14327. We understand your customer did find the Harvest Basket Sweet Potato Fries had a chemical taste and smell. Please note that the quality of the finished product is checked every hour, including multiple smell/taste tests. We have a complete written instruction in place, how the organoleptic test should be organized. Also our QC operators are sufficiently trained to notice all organoleptic differences. The process is as follows: One sample per hour is taken from the production line for a thorough quality control. Regarding organoleptic controls, the following is involved: First, the visual aspect of the fries is evaluated. Secondly, the smell/ off smell is tested by following the below instructions: Handling Standard Actions to be taken when deviation from standard -Test Off smell: (for each sample) 100g pre-baked frozen product (in porcelain dish) in the off smell microwave to heat up for 2min30sec at 600 watts. Then crush the fries and smell them. - Test odour by: * smell the frozen chips. * smell the fried chips by breaking them in 2 and smell the open fries. -Complete QC file : OK / NOK No off smell. Take counter sample if NOK and warn the supervisor. Block the production and take samples for general tasting. And finally, the taste and texture is evalutated: Handling Standard Actions to be taken when deviation from standard -Prepare the fries according the predefined cooking instructions and taste them. - Rate the fries after frying and complete Quality Control Sheet. No off taste or texture. Taste: check after frying. If NOK block production and take samples for general tasting. Block the production and take samples for general tasting. Texture: if NOK, warn supervisor of production to adjust parameters. Block product if necessary and take samples for general tasting. In addition to the above tests, a general tasting is effectuated every morning. The products of the last production (24 hours) are gathered in time sequence. The products are assessed visually and if necessary baked and tasted by the Quality Manager, the Assistant Responsible / Head of QC, the Production Manager, Shift Supervisor and QC employee. The Quality Manager and the Assistant Responsible / Head of QC takes notes on the product, packaging, bake-off, etc. in the QC Reporting Tool. In the below printscreenn you can see the results of the tasting report from the daily tasting. Lines marked in yellow, are the samples from the same timeframe as your complaint. You can see no specific remarks have been made. Based on our data and the above investigation , we therefore believe the product is complaint. As we did also not receive any similar complaints from this lot, we can conclude this is an isolated case or maybe perception of the customer? We do however apologize for the inconvenience. Hope this info serves you well, at your disposal for further questions.

TextBody: Dear Evelyn, Please find attached revised PO DICPO009173-2 for your reference. Changed on unit Price for Item 1 (Crinkle Cut Fries 12x12mm,1kg ) & Item 6 (French Fries Shoestring 7x7mm,1kg) to Eur 1.05 €/kg Thank you. [A close up of a computer Description automatically generated] [cid:image002.png@01DA68C6.F039BCE0] [A white background with black text Description automatically generated] From: Chew Chin <chewchin.e@dpointernational.com> Sent: Monday, February 26, 2024 9:32 AM To: Evelyn Declercq <Evelyn.Declercq@agristo.com>; service@agristo.com Cc: scmshipping <scmshipping@dpointernational.com>; Kung <kung.s@dpointernational.com>; Tracy Tee <tracy.t@dpointernational.com> Subject: Agristo // DICPO009173 ( FOODCRAFT ) , 1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta , Indonesia ) - Requested ETA : 25/06/2024 Dear Evelyn , Please find attached new orders DICPO009173 -1 for your kind perusal. Kindly assist to counter sign and return us a copy for our filing purpose. Based on Indonesia regulation (BPOM Regulation 27/2022), food product must have at least 2/3 remaining shelf life when imported to Indonesia. Hence , we regret to inform that we cannot accept for the current active stock for both Crinkle Cut Fries and French Fries Shoestring. We seek for your kind understanding and look forward to receive Proforma Invoice for VO application. Meantime , please keep us update Cargo Readiness for our shipment booking purpose. Documents Require : 1) Invoice 2) Packing list (with production and expiry date) 3) BL / Seaway Bill (provided by our agent for FCA term) 4) Certificate of Origin 5) Health Certificate 6) Certificate of Analysis complete with Heavy Metals and Microbiological Analysis 7) Packing Declaration 8) Halal Certificate 9) Material Safety Data Sheet ( MSDS ) 10) Mandatory Inspection By SGS Before Stuffing Thank you. [A close up of a computer Description automatically generated] [cid:image002.png@01DA68C6.F039BCE0] [A white background with black text Description automatically generated]

Subject: Réclamation n° 00814844 / Mineure
TextBody: Cher / Chère, Nous vous remercions de nous avoir informé de ce sujet, que nous avons immédiatement enregistré dans notre système sous le numéro de ticket 13849. Nous sommes désolés d'apprendre que votre client n'était pas satisfait de la qualité de cette série. La qualité de nos produits est d'une importance capitale pour nous. Permettez-moi de vous expliquer que toutes les pommes de terre entrantes font l'objet d'une inspection de la qualité et des défauts. Ensuite, les pommes de terre pelées passent par un trie optique. Un deuxième trie optique très sophistiqué est mis en place après la découpe des pommes de terre, ce qui permet également d'éliminer les taches noires des morceaux de pommes de terre. De plus, toutes les heures, le produit emballé est échantillonné et testé pour sa qualité, y compris les imperfections, l'épluchure et le vert. Les enregistrements de ces contrôles de qualités sont conservés. Il est important de noter qu'il y aura toujours des variations dans la production tout au long de l'année en raison de la nature inhérente des pommes de terre en tant que produit naturel. D'un point de vue technique, nous nous efforçons toujours de vous offrir le meilleur produit possible. Nous nous excusons pour tout désagrément que vous avez pu subir. Si vous avez d'autres préoccupations, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter à nouveau. Cordialement, Michelle Bevernage Technical Sales Officer P +32 496 38 91 92 --------------- Original Message ---------------

Alginet, nº 1, 46460, Silla (Valencia) es responsable de un tratamiento en el que son almacenados los datos personales contenidos en esta comunicación con el fin de gestionar las comunicaciones electrónicas, almacenar los correos en el histórico de comunicaciones y, si fuera necesario monitorizar el mensaje y archivos adjuntos por motivos de seguridad y prevención de virus. Asimismo, dichos datos y otros de contacto que el interesado haya proporcionado a través de su tarjeta de visita u otros medios, serán incluidos en el directorio de contactos de la entidad para mantenimiento de la relación comercial. Los interesados pueden ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, supresión, oposición, limitación al tratamiento, oposición a la adopción de decisiones automatizadas y portabilidad, revocación del consentimiento otorgado en relación con los tratamientos basados en el mismo, dirigiéndose por escrito a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada o en aquella que la sustituya y se comunique en el Registro General de Protección de Datos, o enviando un mail a la siguiente dirección delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es, adjuntando cualquiera que se a la vía de ejercicio de los derechos, fotocopia del D.N.I. La inclusión en esta comunicación de datos personales de terceros, queda limitada a datos actuales y veraces y requiere con carácter previo informar y solicitar el consentimiento a dichos terceros para el tratamiento de sus datos conforme los extremos contenidos en el presente aviso. Con el fin de mantener los datos actualizados, los interesados pueden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada cualquier variación de sus datos, así como el cese de su actividad en la entidad a la que pertenecen. - Este missatge i els documents que, si és el cas, porte annexos, poden contindre informació confidencial. Per això, s'informa a qui el reba per error que la informació continguda en el mateix és reservada i el seu ús no autoritzat està prohibit legalment, pel que en este cas li preguem que ens ho comunique per la mateixa via, s'abstinga de realitzar còpies del missatge o remetre'l o entregar-lo a una altra persona, procedint a esborrar-lo immediatament. Alginet, núm. 1, 46460, Silla (València) és responsable d'un tractament en què són emmagatzemats les dades personals contingudes en esta comunicació a fi de gestionar les comunicacions electròniques, emmagatzemar els correus en l'històric de comunicacions i, si fóra necessari monitoritzar el missatge i arxius adjunts per motius de seguretat i prevenció de virus. Així mateix, tals dades i altres de contacte que l'interessat haja proporcionat a través de la seua targeta de visita o altres mitjans, seran inclosos en el directori de contactes de l'entitat per a manteniment de la relació comercial. Els interessats poden exercitar els seus drets d'accés, rectificació, supressió i oposició, limitació al tractament, oposició a l´adopció de decisions automatitzades i portabilitat, revocació del consentiment atorgat en relació amb els tractaments basat en el mateix, dirigint-se per escrit a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada o en aquella que la substituïsca i es comunique en el Registre General de Protecció de Dades, o enviant un mail a la següent adreça delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es, adjuntant qualsevol que siga la via d´exercici dels drets, fotocòpia del D.N.I. La inclusió en esta comunicació de dades personals de tercers, queda limitada a dades actuals i veraces i requerix amb caràcter previ informar i sol·licitar el consentiment a dits tercers per al tractament de les seues dades conforme els extrems continguts en el present avís. A fi de mantindre les dades actualitzades, els interessats poden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada qualsevol variació de les seues dades, així com el cessament de la seua activitat en l'entitat a qual pertanyen.

Subject: Ref: 318621JC Chicken in wedges pack
TextBody: Dear James Curran, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014351. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : B02233341857 Packaging day : 30/11/2023 The production process includes numerous physical and optical elimination steps to detect and remove foreign objects. Agristo continuously strives to invest in the latest best practice technical solutions to prevent foreign object contamination. Initially, the potatoes go through a stone remover, which operates based on centrifugal forces and effectively eliminates any objects heavier than potatoes. Following the stone remover, there is a water bath to remove floating particles, and a hedgehog conveyor that eliminates leafage. The leafage adheres to the pins that extend from the conveyor and is subsequently removed. After peeling and washing, the potatoes undergo optical sorting to eliminate foreign objects. Using a color camera, a mechanical system rejects foreign bodies, green potatoes, and potatoes with severe defects and diseases. The potatoes are then transported to the production line, where they are cut and inspected for black parts by a second optical sorter, and any defects are rejected using compressed air. Additionally, small dark-colored foreign bodies are detected and rejected. These initial steps are designed to effectively remove foreign bodies from the potatoes. Based on the description and pictures, this foreign body was recognised as a piece of chicken. In our factory we do not process chicken or any meat at all. The Farmfoods wedges are made in our Tilburg factory were we also have a strict allergen policy. Therefore we are convinced that this piece of chicken can not come from our factory. Also based on the picture, we think the piece of chicken might have come from the end consumer by preparing a meal. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: Fremdkörper METALL! - Vorabinformation: Az: 00024110 Kundenreklamation bezüglich Gustoria Jumbo Fries
TextBody: Sehr geehrte Frau Thome, Wir haben den Fremdkörper inzwischen erhalten und ausführlich analysiert. Das Fazit unserer Recherche ist, dass es sich hierbei nicht um ein Metall, sondern um einen Kunststoff handelt. Nachfolgend finden Sie die vollständigen Ergebnisse unserer Forschung: Metalldetektion: Fremdkörper wurde über dem Metalldetektor getestet und wird nicht emittiert. Visuell: Fremdkörper werden genauer untersucht und ähneln eher einer Faser als einem Metall. Ein Ende ist eng gewunden, fast spitzenartig. Dieser wickelt sich in der Mitte ab und eine Bandstruktur wird sichtbar. Das andere Ende ist ausgefranst. Das Ganze ist ziemlich elastisch und scheint eine Art Kunststoff zu sein. Unter dem Mikroskop wird die Faserstruktur besser sichtbar. Dies scheint eine Kunststoffstruktur zu sein (siehe Bild „Faserstruktur“). Unser technischer Service erkennt das Material nicht. Es handelt sich nicht um ein Abkratzen von einem Maschinenteil oder von einem Förderband. Entflammbarkeit: Beim Erhitzen fängt der Gegenstand sehr schnell Feuer und brennt/schmilzt schnell. Nach dem Ausblasen bildet das Ende eine für Kunststoff typische erstarrte Tropfenform (siehe Bild „Erhitzt“). Abschluss: Der Fremdkörper ist kein Metall, sondern eine Plastikschnur. Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten und stehen Ihnen für weitere Informationen gerne zur Verfügung. Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Pieter Lapierre Technical Sales Officer ............................................................................................... Ridder de Ghellinckstraat 9, B-8710 Wielsbeke, Belgium P +32 56 54 10 56 M +32 477 59 09 60 Pieter.Lapierre@agristo.com <mailto:Pieter.Lapierre@agristo.com> www.agristo.com

Subject: French Fries Quote Request
TextBody: Dear Miss Abufele, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? What volume do you forecast to do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? What incoterm would you want to use? Based on this I can make a more accurate pricelist. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. In attachment I've already added a catalogue with our product range. With

Subject: B&A Pasen 2024
TextBody: Geachte relatie, De Paasdagen zijn in zicht en vanuit Forecasting & Replenishment Jumbo zijn we druk bezig met de voorbereidingen. Om er ook dit jaar weer een gezamenlijk succes van te maken hebben we nadrukkelijk uw hulp nodig. De extra volumes vragen ons allen om extra inzet en flexibiliteit t.o.v. de normale bestel- en afleverschema’s. Om de beschikbaarheid van artikelen aan onze winkels te garanderen, maar ook opstoppingen en wachttijden bij onze DCs te voorkomen streven we naar een goede spreiding van de leveringen; het kan dus zijn dat we extra levermomenten van u vragen. Ook op 2e Paasdag zijn wij geopend voor ontvangst. Graag vernemen we voor Vrijdag 01/03 of hier eventueel gegronde afwijkingen op zijn. Wij rekenen op uw flexibiliteit en medewerking en gaan er van uit dat we met gezamenlijke inzet tot een succesvolle Paas periode komen. Dear partner, Easter is coming closer and within Forecasting & Replenishment we are intensively working on preparations. To make it a collaborative success this year we need your help. The extra volume these days asks for extra effort and flexibility in comparison with the regular ordering and delivery schedule. To ensure the in-store availability of our articles, but also to reduce waiting times at our distribution centers, we strive to a good dispersion of deliveries. It could be that we ask for extra delivery moments of you. We are opened for delivery on Easter Monday. We would like to know before Friday 01/03 if there are anomalies on the regular delivery schedule. We count on your flexibility and co-operation and assume that with collaborative effort this Easter period will be a success. Met vriendelijke groet /

Dag Bram Hierbij de klant van Brazilië De estimated volume is 120 ton per jaar en zijn segment is Retail, uit de verkregen informatie blijkt het ook te gaan om een importer. mvg Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Agristo Sales [sales@agristo.com] Sent: 26/02/2024 11:42 To: flavio.porto@komport.com.br Subject: RE: RES: RES: RES: Agristo Sales Dear Flavio I am very sorry for te delay. The reason i might be hard to contact is due to me being an intern. I was able to discus your case internally. Sadly due to the estimated volume/year being to small for us to handle from Belgium will I be unable to help you further. Your information will be forwarded to our agent in Brazil, who can help you further. Once again I apolegize for the delay.

Goedemorgen Wesley, Ik zie dat dit artikel deze week opnieuw geproduceerd wordt. De productierun start morgen en zal lopen tot en met donderdag 29/02. Er zullen ongeveer 165 paletten geproduceerd worden. Met vriendelijke groeten, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Wesley Koedam [wesleykoedam@farmfrites.com] Sent: 26/02/2024 10:34 To: line.cabbeke@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: rinustanis@farmfrites.com Subject: 547.002 Goedemorgen, Wanneer produceren jullie ons artikel 547.002 weer voor ons ? Subject: Agristo // DICPO009173 ( FOODCRAFT ) ,  1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta  , Indonesia ) -  Requested ETA : 25/06/2024
TextBody: Hey Beau, Zie hierbij het nieuwe order voor Indonesië. Mvg, Evelyn Declercq Customer Service Officer Export Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 55 --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Chew Chin [chewchin.e@dpointernational.com] Sent: 26/02/2024 08:17 To: evelyn.declercq@agristo.com; service@agristo.com Cc: kung.s@dpointernational.com; scmshipping@dpointernational.com; tracy.t@dpointernational.com Subject: RE: Agristo // DICPO009173 ( FOODCRAFT ) , 1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta , Indonesia ) - Requested ETA : 25/06/2024 Dear Evelyn, Please find attached revised PO DICPO009173-2 for your reference. Changed on unit Price for Item 1 (Crinkle Cut Fries 12x12mm,1kg ) & Item 6 (French Fries Shoestring 7x7mm,1kg) to Eur 1.05 €/kg Thank you. From: Chew Chin <chewchin.e@dpointernational.com> Sent: Monday, February 26, 2024 9:32 AM To: Evelyn Declercq <Evelyn.Declercq@agristo.com>; service@agristo.com Cc: scmshipping <scmshipping@dpointernational.com>; Kung <kung.s@dpointernational.com>; Tracy Tee <tracy.t@dpointernational.com> Subject: Agristo // DICPO009173 ( FOODCRAFT ) , 1 x 40' Reefer -- FCA terms ( Antwerp , Belgium to Jakarta , Indonesia ) - Requested ETA : 25/06/2024 Dear Evelyn , Please find attached new orders DICPO009173 -1 for your kind perusal. Kindly assist to counter sign and return us a copy for our filing purpose. Based on Indonesia regulation (BPOM Regulation 27/2022), food product must have at least 2/3 remaining shelf life when imported to Indonesia. Hence , we regret to inform that we cannot accept for the current active stock for both Crinkle Cut Fries and French Fries Shoestring. We seek for your kind understanding and look forward to receive Proforma Invoice for VO application. Meantime , please keep us update Cargo Readiness for our shipment booking purpose. Documents Require : 1) Invoice 2) Packing list (with production and expiry date) 3) BL / Seaway Bill (provided by our agent for FCA term) 4) Certificate of Origin 5) Health Certificate 6) Certificate of Analysis complete with Heavy Metals and Microbiological Analysis 7) Packing Declaration 8) Halal Certificate 9) Material Safety Data Sheet ( MSDS ) 10) Mandatory Inspection By SGS Before Stuffing Thank you.

I apolegize for the inconvenience.

very grateful and you didn't talk to me if it is with your brand to know the prices too El El lun, feb 26, 2024 a la(s) 8:42 a.m., Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com>> escribió: Hello Thank you for the fast reply. When we are talking about a private label, we need an MOQ of 500ton/year per SKU. We also require a financial guarantee of €2.000/SKU, which will be fully refunded once the MOQ is reached. We take care of the packaging with our partner, all we need from you is the design. The first delivery will take around 2 months from recieving the design until we can start production. Afterwards we can keep a stock to make sure this process only takes a week. I'll discus your case further internally and get back to you soon. If anything is unclear be sure to reach out to me and I'll be happy to help.

Hallo, Ik heb contact gehad met deze klant uit Saudi Arabië en op vraag van onze agent in Saudi Arabië, verwijs ik hem door naar jullie. de verkregen informatie: naam: Abdo Debs Bedrijf: Alborkan Distributeur voor Fast Food en Food Service Volume: 200ton/maand Zoekt naar: 6x6, 7x7, 9x9 frieten in 2,5kg zakken. Ze hebben hun eigen warenhuis en koelers Als er iets onduidelijk is laat het mij weten en ik zal proberen meer duiding te geven. Met vriendelijke groeten Emiel Vanwynsberghe --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Abdaluahab Debsawi [abd.debsawi@gmail.com] Sent: 19/02/2024 22:39 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: A+ grade french fries to Saudi-Arabia Dear sales manager Thank you for reply me I wiil give you more information about us We are local company of food like frozen chicken and meet and vegetarian We started work by fries potatoes before 6 month and distributed in some cities We still import frome Belgium the company’s name is (farmfrites) he give us good price and high quality but the capacity is low it can give me only tow container every month only this is reason I fond other sources because my market is big i need more quantity Gor my order is The class grade A+ The size 6*6 &7*7 & 9*9 The packaging 2.5 kg every bags We have our warehouse plus specialty chillers In terms of our business strategy, we are looking at an order quantity of around 200 tons every month If we agree in the future I wait your answer and more details If you can send me catalogs of product and photos And specifications Of fries potatoes Thank you so much On 16 Feb 2024 Fri at 2:46 PM Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> wrote: Dear mr Abodo, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: Urgent Help if possible - non-delivery of goods
TextBody: Good morning Sara, I hope all is well with you. Sorry to bother you, but we have had our Monday order for chips delayed until Wednesday due to an issue with loading onto the vessel - apparently the wrong reference code was used so the container was not loaded. Would it be possible for this shipment to be delivered to us tomorrow, instead of Wednesday? Alternatively, is there a way we could receive the Wednesday delivery a day early? The only reason I ask is that we are currently out of stock on 2 lines and about to run out of a third so will fail on a lot of our deliveries if the stock doesn't arrive before Wednesday. I appreciate any help you could possibly offer.

Hello Thank you for the fast reply. When we are talking about a private label, we need an MOQ of 500ton/year per SKU. We also require a financial guarantee of €2.000/SKU, which will be fully refunded once the MOQ is reached. We take care of the packaging with our partner, all we need from you is the design. The first delivery will take around 2 months from recieving the design until we can start production. Afterwards we can keep a stock to make sure this process only takes a week. I'll discus your case further internally and get back to you soon. If anything is unclear be sure to reach out to me and I'll be happy to help.

Subject: Inquiry Regarding Purchase of Skin-Off Potato Chips in Various Sizes
TextBody: Hi Maxime, I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out from UNU Pty Ltd, an import-export company based in Adelaide, South Australia. I'm excited to inform you that our company has recently been appointed by Godwit Pacific Limited from Papua New Guinea to source AA Grade Chips directly from Belgium. As one of the major frozen food distributors in PNG, Godwit Pacific is keen on exploring potential partnerships for high-quality products. To provide you with further insight, I have attached the company profile of Godwit Pacific for your reference. It has come to our attention that Godwit Pacific is currently importing four 40-foot containers of Golden River Chips by Lutosa per month from another trading company. If your products offer a similar quality and taste to Golden River Chips, along with competitive pricing, we would be interested in considering a gradual transition to your products. We believe that collaborating with your esteemed company could offer mutual benefits and opportunities for growth. We look forward to the possibility of discussing this potential partnership further. Please let us know if you would be open to exploring this opportunity or if you require any additional information from our end. Thank you for considering this proposal. We eagerly await your response. Jack Liu Managing Director M +61 401 841 804 E admin@unu-au.com Confidentiality/Limited Liability Statement. This message contains privileged and confidential information intended only for the use of the addressee named above. If you are not the intended recipient of this message, you must not disseminate, copy, or take any action in reliance on it. If you have received this message in error, please notify UNU Pty Ltd immediately. Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender, except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of UNU Pty Ltd. The sender cannot guarantee that this email or any attachment to it is free of computer viruses or other conditions which may damage or interfere with data, hardware, or software with which it might be used. It is sent on the strict condition that the user carries out and relies on its own procedures for ensuring that its use will not interfere with the recipient’s systems and the recipient assumes all risk of use and absolves the sender of all responsibility for any consequence of its use. ________________________________ From: Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> Sent: Thursday, 15 February 2024 1:00 AM To: Jack Liu <admin@unu-au.com> Subject: RE: Inquiry Regarding Purchase of Skin-Off Potato Chips in Various Sizes Dear Jack Liu, Thanks for your initial information. Some additional questions I have: * What is your company about? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? * Of the mentioned products, what is the estimated volume?

Subject: FW: בנוגע לבקשת שירות #310,584 FW: לגביי ציפס שקניתי דחוף
TextBody: Hi Mania, Based on the pictures you have send, I believe this is a piece of sprout on the potato. Sprout can occur while the potatoes are being stored. Potatoes with sprout are still good for consumption, but the sprout should be removed. I have checked the production and tasting records around the time of your complaint, and no remarks about sprout on potatoes have been noted. Normally this kind of defects should have been rejected by our optical sorters. But unfortunately no system can give us a 100% guarantee that all potatoes with sprout will be detected. And do I understand correctly her daughter had her tonsils removed and was again happy to taste some fries? You can guarantee your customer that it is not an insect and safe for consumption.

Hello, Yes that is correct, this is due to us having more then one generic brand and I'll first have to discus internally what generic brand we can offer you, so that we don't hinder any of our other partners in Venezuela.

Subject: request sidewinders fries
TextBody: Hello Our estimated sales volume would initially be around 50-100 tons per year. This is an estimate, because we don't know the product at all yet. I look forward to your reply.

Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

TextBody: ***photos requested***** Our Reference BX138054 Please quote the above reference on all correspondence 26th February 2024 Agristo N V Fao Richard Storer Old Mill Place High Street Tattenhall Chester CH3 9PX FOR THE ATTENTION OF Marlies OWN LABEL PRODUCT COMPLAINT - Chefs Essentials Straight Cut Chips 4 x 2.27kg BATCH CODE INFORMATION - A01 24016 15.1.2026 COMPLAINT DETAIL - lots of black ones One of our customers has had reason to contact us regarding the above mentioned complaint. The sample relating to this complaint is being held at branch Should you need to contact the Booker branch, Ipswich 598 - Tel 01473 321171, please ensure you quote the reference C598-1687. We will require written acknowledgement from yourselves within 10 working days, assuring us that this matter has been received and logged for your records. Please forward your acknowledgement by Email to customer.relations@booker.co.uk or alternatively by post to Booker Cash & Carry Ltd, Equity House, Irthlingborough Road, Wellingborough, NN8 1LT. Please note This notification attracts an administration charge of £2.75 plus the customer reimbursement cost of £11.99. These charges are in accordance with our current deals and charges, linked to your trading terms. This will be invoiced at the end of our next financial period. Subject: Residual / Redundant / Surplus stock
TextBody: Hi There, Hope you’re well. I got your details from the Anuga Trade Fair Exhibitor List as YBY was an exhibitor. I would like to introduce Jumbo Commodities to you and see if we might be of interest to you. At Jumbo Commodities Ltd and we are continually looking to purchase surplus / redundant residual stocks. Whether it is frozen, dried, or ambient, short dated, or out of date, any non food, if you have a parcel of products sitting in the corner of your warehouse taking up space or costing you money, we’ll almost certainly be able to find a home for it. We’re quick to inspect and agree a deal before we pay and will then send in our own transport to collect. With the ever increasing costs associated with the disposal of unwanted products, we're often able to realise some value for you instead, or at least move it on. We also work with a large, fully accredited waste management company if you have items that need to be disposed of in a controlled manner. With a large network of customers all over the world, we can even transport brand sensitive products to retails zones that will not compromise the brand. We can provide full stripping, re-packaging and re-labelling services too for both ambient and frozen product. Over the past 20 years we’ve developed some interesting clients and we love the challenge of finding a home for even the most unusual products. If the above is of interest to you and you think we could some business with Agristo please do get in touch. If you have any surplus stock lists to share, we would love to take a look. I look forward to hearing from you. Many thanks, Kim Kim North Jumbo Commodities Limited Milroy House, Sayers Lane, Tenterden, Kent TN30 6BW, UK T +44 (0)1580 765 777 M +44 (0) 7891 717 061

Subject: Urgent Help if possible - non-delivery of goods
TextBody: Hello again, The haulier has checked what his possibilities are to advance your next order. If they would ship the order tonight, the order will only arrive tomorrow afternoon at 16h at Teesport, which will be too late for delivery tomorrow afternoon. So the only option is to ship the order tomorrow from Zeebrugge into Hull. Afterwards they will deliver the order straight from the vessel on Wednesday. We are very sorry we cannot deliver the order earlier.

Subject: French Fries Quote Request
TextBody: Good afternoon, * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * Yes, we produce frozen foods and distribute to supermarkets in Honduras. * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * We produce frozen foods, we don’t purchase and resell. * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? What volume do you forecast to do annually? * We have never distributed French fries. * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Yes * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * We produce our own frozen food and distribute to supermarkets in Honduras. Yes, we do have a website: www.kouzinahn.com * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? * Premium products at a reasonable price. * What incoterm would you want to use? Based on this I can make a more accurate pricelist. Thank you, ESTEFANIA ABUFELE PRESIDENTA [cid:image002.png@01DA68A1.3BC301B0] KOUZINA ESENCIA CULINARIA, HONDURAS PLAZA JUAN LINDO 26 AVENIDA, 8 CALLE NO SAN PEDRO SULA, HONDURAS 21102 C +504 9437-5264 Conoce sobre Kouzina: https://kouzinahn.com/ [LogoESR_ok] From: Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> Sent: Monday, February 26, 2024 4:26 AM To: estefania.abufele@iesa.hn Subject: RE: French Fries Quote Request Dear Miss Abufele, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: * Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? * If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? * What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? What volume do you forecast to do annually? * Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? * Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? * What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? * What incoterm would you want to use? Based on this I can make a more accurate pricelist. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. In attachment I've already added a catalogue with our product range. With

Subject: Export to Suriname - Agristo
TextBody: dag Faisal, in bijlage de prijzen incl CIF (Paramaribo port). vriendelijke groeten, Gilles --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Faisal Elwanni [faisal.elwanni@pacific.sr] Sent: 12/02/2024 21:27 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: FW: RE: Fwd: Export to Suriname - Agristo Beste Gilles, Wij hebben het nagetrokken en de coated fries in onze markt zijn zoutig. Kun je de offerte herberekenen in CIF (Paramaribo port). Bij voorbaat dank, Faisal EL-Wanni On Monday, February 05, 2024 03:34 EST, Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> wrote: Dag Faisal, Al onze standaard merken hebben een transparante zak. De 9x9mm is niet beschikbaar in een 1kg zak in onze standaard merken, enkel in 2,5kg zakken. Groeten, Gilles --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Faisal Elwanni [faisal.elwanni@pacific.sr] Sent: 2/02/2024 16:31 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Re: FW: RE: Fwd: Export to Suriname - Agristo Hi Benjamin, Bedankt voor de toegestuurde offerte. Ik zie dat de Eurogold een transparante zak is, maar is er ook een merk beschikbaar waarvan de verpakking niet transparant is? Als laatse kun je ook de 9 x 9 friet offereren in 1kg verpakkingen, coated en uncoated. Bij voorbaat dank, Faisal EL-Wanni ​​​​​ On Friday, February 02, 2024 09:48 EST, Agristo Sales <sales@agristo.com> wrote: Dag Faisal, Bij deze bezorg ik je de prijslijst in bijlage. Let wel, dit is een FCA prijs. Indien je een CIF prijs wilt, gelieve aan te geven in welke haven er geleverd moet worden. We stellen graag ons merk Eurogold voor om samen te werken, in bijlage kan je hier meer info over vinden. Vriendelijke groeten, Gilles --------------- Forwarded Message --------------- From: Agristo Sales [sales@agristo.com] Sent: 2/02/2024 15:41 To: benjamin.meire@agristo.com Subject: RE: Fwd: Export to Suriname - Agristo Dag Faisal, Bij deze bezorg ik je de prijslijst in bijlage. Let wel, dit is een FCA prijs. Indien je een CIF prijs wilt, gelieve aan te geven in welke haven er geleverd moet worden. We stellen graag ons merk Eurogold voor om samen te werken, in bijlage kan je hier meer info over vinden. Vriendelijke groeten, Gilles --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Benjamin Meire [benjamin.meire@agristo.com] Sent: 2/02/2024 09:25 To: sales@agristo.com Subject: Fwd: Export to Suriname - Agristo Verzonden vanuit Outlook voor iOS

Subject: Tokyo Calling: Your Exclusive Pass to FaW TOKYO 2024 Unveiled!
TextBody: [FaW TOKYO] Dates: April 17 (Wed) - 19 (Fri), 2024 Venue: Tokyo Big Sight, Japan Organiser: RX Japan Ltd. Tokyo Unleashed Global Showcase and Local Excellence Awaits! Immerse in Tokyo's style hub at FaW TOKYO, uniting creativity, innovation, and trends. From April 17 to 19, 2024, Tokyo Big Sight will host 800 exhibitors spanning 25 countries. Your gateway to excellence in textiles, brands, and Japanese craftsmanship awaits. Don't miss this opportunity to be part of the future of fashion — welcome to FaW TOKYO! >> Register Your Visitor Badge<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=FAWTS2024_Visit_Aware_Nurtu_E_240227_LS%2FiOFT_EN&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=afMxN%2FeyGV06jaThqJeP66SMoRFtmjiQsfFbm7mFioC9eSlthrWLu1iH5%2FIZvH9diNjmFHYOYtsPmH7xWHuQCQ%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=41074&elqTrackId=2E2C7BDE39E416E6E077B435CB338621&elq=6ceda32f585c47c3a56f1dd75ce2acc1&elqaid=920129&elqat=1> >> Register VIP Badge<https://app.campaign.rxjapan.jp/e/er?utm_campaign=FAWTS2024_Visit_Aware_Nurtu_E_240227_LS%2FiOFT_EN&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Eloqua&querytoken=afMxN%2FeyGV06jaThqJeP66SMoRFtmjiQsfFbm7mFioC9eSlthrWLu1iH5%2FIZvH9diNjmFHYOYtsPmH7xWHuQCQ%3D%3D&s=12511217&lid=41073&elqTrackId=7909FD77B91B5440B7B64134547CF70E&elq=6ceda32f585c47c3a56f1dd75ce2acc1&elqaid=920129&elqat=1> *Each person requires visitor registration for entry. / VIP Ticket is for Manager or above job titles. - What's on - 360-Degree Fashion Exploration: from textiles to brands The comprehensive exhibition covers the entire fashion spectrum, from textiles to cutting-edge brands. Discover the NOW and NEXT of fashion, all in one extraordinary event. 7 Specialised Shows [Sustainable Fashion Expo] SUSTAINABLE FASHION EXPO [Wellness & Sport Expo] WELLNESS & SPORTS EXPO [Textile Expo] TEXTILE EXPO [Japan Fashion Expo] JAPAN FASHION EXPO [Brand & Designers Expo] BRAND & DESIGNERS EXPO [Fashion Sourcing Expo] FASHION SOURCING EXPO [Fashion Digital Transformation Expo] FASHION DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION EXPO -------------------------------------------------------------- Japanese Excellence Discover a world of craftsmanship with the highest quality of Made-in-Japan products and textiles and get the chance to connect with OEM/ODM partners. -------------------------------------------------------------- Global Capital, Eternal Style Immerse yourself in the heart of a global fashion capital, Tokyo, where creativity, innovation, and cultural richness converge, setting the stage for an unparalleled fashion experience. Ready to dive into the world of fashion? Registration is now open for FaW TOKYO 2024! Join us from April 17 to 19, 2024, at Tokyo Big Sight. Subject: FW: Aunt Bessie – Crispy Skin on Homestyle Chips (1.3kg bag) Foreign body complaint R 862110
TextBody: Good Afternoon Michele I hope you are well? We have had the attached raised to local EHO Please can I ask that you assist with providing the below information in regards to FB controls also if you could look into the production run in question and highlight if there were any issues. Thanks in advance Amy Amy Brown Assistant RDQ Manager Nomad Foods Europe Limited Registered in England & Wales | Company No 5879466 Registered Office: No. 1 New Square | Bedfont Lakes Business Park | Feltham | Middlesex | TW14 8HA Phone: +44 1482 736324 <tel:+44 1482 736324> Mobile: 07972 506594 <tel:07972 506594> Fax: email: Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com <mailto:Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com> Web:www.nomadfoods.com <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___http://www.nomadfood.com/___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjQ2ZWUwNzU1NjMwYzZlOTlhMGRhNWViYmFlZjQ4MjVlOjY6ZDllZjo0MWQ0Yzg2NzhmZTEyNTUxNmIwMjE4MTgzMmRkMDhiMjcxZGM3ZmY2Y2FjMjAwNDA3MmU0ODZmZDg0YmM1NjlhOmg6VA> P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Thanks! LEGAL DISCLAIMER : This e-mail may contain confidential or privileged information. If you have received this e-mail in error, you must not disclose to any other person, nor take copies of, the contents of this e-mail and/or any attachment to it. If this email is marked 'personal' Nomad Foods Europe Limited is not liable in any way for its content. E-mails are susceptible to alteration. Nomad Foods Europe Limited shall not be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified. We try to ensure that our communications are free of viruses but do not accept responsibility for any loss or damage that viruses may cause. You should take your own steps to ensure that communications are free of viruses. Nomad Foods Europe Limited and its employees operate in compliance with the law. Any recommended selling price (RSP) is provided for guidance only. Retailers are free to set their own prices. Nomad Foods Europe Limited is a limited liability company registered in England and Wales, company registration number 5879466. Registered Office: No. 1 New Square, Bedfont Lakes Business Park, Feltham, Middlesex TW 14 8HA. From: Paul Maylunn <Paul.Maylunn@peterborough.gov.uk <mailto:Paul.Maylunn@peterborough.gov.uk> > Sent: 26 February 2024 14:20 To: Lau, Ming <ming.lau@nomadfoods.com <mailto:ming.lau@nomadfoods.com> >; Brand, Sandy <Sandra.Brand@nomadfoods.com <mailto:Sandra.Brand@nomadfoods.com> > Subject: Aunt Bessie – Crispy Skin on Homestyle Chips (1.3kg bag) Foreign body complaint R 862110 CAUTION: This email originated from outside our organisation. Do not open attachments or click links, unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe. Dear Ming, Sandy, I hope you are well. Please find attached details of an alleged stone foreign body complaint from South Tyneside Council. The complainant is to take the item to the officer. There are photos with a scale; the stone appears to be 4mm across. Batch details are provided. Please would you provide the foreign body controls at the factory and detail where the factory is? Please would you provide stats on the incidence of foreign bodies at the site, including complaints and rejected from production if kept? Where production detects is there a feedback mechanism to earlier in the production process? There is quoted an Irish address, what is the UK address given? This complaint may already have been reported by Sainsbury’s as retailer since they refunded. Please let me know if you want to examine it. If you would provide details I will be able to respond to the officer, and I’ll be happy to discuss further with you, should you wish.

Subject: National Oil Corporation Business Opportunity.
TextBody: From Peter procurement officer, Malaysia Oil Refinery Sdn Bhd. I greet you with warm regards. My name is Peter Cella, I work for Malaysia Oil Refinery Sdn Bhd as a procurement officer, Malaysia Oil Refinery Sdn Bhd is an Oil Refining Company located in South East Asia. On my desk is a mandate to arrange for a Crude Oil purchase from the National Oil Corporation of Libya, from the State of Libya for up to 2,000,000 (2 Million) barrels on monthly bases for 12 calendar months. The reason for my reaching out to you is because I am in the process of establishing a broker/mediator or a middle-man structure to mediate between the 2 parties involved (our Company and the Company in Libya) before the contract is signed. You may be wondering why I can't do it myself. The honest fact is that as an employee working for this company, it is against our company's operational ethics/policy for an employee to be involved or profit in any financial dealings between our Company and another company, hence I am looking for a trustworthy person outside my work circle in order to maintain a discreet profile. I wish to extend this partnership to you to establish a broker/agent or a middle man structure with you while I work from the background to guide you. Our company pays $3 per barrel of Crude Oil as a commission/brokerage amount, if the target is 2 Million barrels a month, we stand to share USD$6 Million every month for a span of 12 months. Contact me if you are interested in this deal, so that I can give you clearer details of this operation. I can be reached directly through my email address (p.cellapeter@gmail.com<mailto:p.cellapeter@gmail.com>) Peter Cella Procurement Officer Malaysia Oil Refinery Sdn Bhd

Subject: Invitation to Participate in India Green Energy Expo on 03-04-05 June 2024 at Bangalore International Exhibition Center
TextBody: Dear Sir/Madam, Greetings from the India Green Energy Expo!!!!!!! It takes pleasure in inviting you to the 2nd edition of the India Green Energy Expo being held at Bangalore International Exhibition Center from 03-04-05 June 2024. The 2nd edition of India Green Energy Expo is being organized jointly with Media Day Marketing and KRESMA will be acting as a one-stop platform for the stakeholders in the Renewable Energy sector such as manufacturers, Developers, Technology Providers, Traders, and Consultants with key focus on Solar, Wind, Hydro and Biomass Energy, Carbon credits and role of RE in the current scenario of the increased pace of Electrification in the mobility sector and adoption of RE over fossil fuel-based energy. The RE Scenario in India The renewable energy sector in India has seen tremendous growth with the world's largest renewable energy expansion program taking the total capacity of RE to 175 GW till 2022. India has moved to the 4th position globally for overall installed RE Capacity and achieved its Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC) commitment 9 years in advance after crossing the 40% installed capacity target from non-fossil sources in November 2021. The India Green Energy Expo is a great opportunity for your company to participate and create business opportunities by reaching more and more stakeholders. For more details visit: www.indiagreenenergyexpo.com<https://gmail.us21.list-manage.com/track/click?u=fe903f72ca75fda44d0d99e3b&id=ad00589336&e=f7a6121aea> If you have any queries feel free to contact us. We look forward to hearing from you soon to proceed further. An early reply will be highly appreciated. Thanks & Regards Media Day Marketing Mobile:+91 9342185915 This email was sent to sales@agristo.com<mailto:sales@agristo.com> why did I get this?<https://gmail.us21.list-manage.com/about?u=fe903f72ca75fda44d0d99e3b&id=477a088a3e&e=f7a6121aea&c=6a9932080b> unsubscribe from this list<https://gmail.us21.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=fe903f72ca75fda44d0d99e3b&id=477a088a3e&t=b&e=f7a6121aea&c=6a9932080b> update subscription preferences<https://gmail.us21.list-manage.com/profile?u=fe903f72ca75fda44d0d99e3b&id=477a088a3e&e=f7a6121aea&c=6a9932080b> MEDIA DAY · 202 · Hyderabad, Telangana 500036 · India

Subject: FW: Aunt Bessie – Crispy Skin on Homestyle Chips (1.3kg bag) Foreign body complaint R 862110
TextBody: Good morning Amy, Sorry to read you have received the below incident. After carefully reading the letter, we understand that a very small piece of stone (4mm) has been found inside the ‘Aunt Bessies Homestyle Chips 1.3kg’. As you know, we have a lot of physical an optical elimination steps in our production process to prevent foreign objects from entering our production. These steps are: • Stone remover • Hedgehog conveyor to eliminate leafage/stems • Optical sorter on peeled potatoes: by use of a color camera, foreign bodies, green potatoes and potatoes with heavy defects and diseases are rejected. • Water knives: not meant for elimination but here FB’s will be eliminated that block the knives. • Length sorters : kind of sieves where the very small fries fall through and are eliminated • Second optical sorter on cut chips • 2nd length sorters in packaging on frozen product • Third optical sorter in packaging on frozen product • Metal detectors During every production run, multiple quality checks and controls are effectuated and all data is carefully registered. Based on the lotcode we can link the following production: Lot: C01 23 336 1125 Production batch: 1202123440 Production day: 02/12/2023 I could not find any remarks linked to this complaint. Looking at this very small piece of stone, it may have been able to pass through the cutting blocks of the water knives. However as it is so small, we are quite confident to say that it would not be possible that this can go through our whole production process without being eliminated. Given its size (only 4mm), this would certainly have fallen through the sieves, or get lost in the process water. Based on our experience and our knowledge, the root cause can be any of the following: - Or this piece has grown inside a potato and given its tiny size, it was still in a fry after cutting the potato making it impossible to be detected by our sophisticated equipment. (mosty likely) - Or the contamination took place at the consumer? We do however apologize for the inconvenience. Please let me know should you have any other questions. At your disposal, Michèle Vandenbroucke Technical Sales P +32 56 54 09 64 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Brown, Amy [Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com] Sent: 26/02/2024 15:45 To: Michele.Vandenbroucke@agristo.com Subject: FW: Aunt Bessie – Crispy Skin on Homestyle Chips (1.3kg bag) Foreign body complaint R 862110 Good Afternoon Michele I hope you are well? We have had the attached raised to local EHO Please can I ask that you assist with providing the below information in regards to FB controls also if you could look into the production run in question and highlight if there were any issues. Thanks in advance Amy Amy Brown Assistant RDQ Manager Nomad Foods Europe Limited Registered in England & Wales | Company No 5879466 Registered Office: No. 1 New Square | Bedfont Lakes Business Park | Feltham | Middlesex | TW14 8HA Phone: +44 1482 736324 Mobile: 07972 506594 Fax: email: Amy.Brown@nomadfoods.com Web:www.nomadfoods.com P THINK BEFORE YOU PRINT: Before printing e-mails, think whether it is really necessary. Thanks! LEGAL DISCLAIMER : This e-mail may contain confidential or privileged information. If you have received this e-mail in error, you must not disclose to any other person, nor take copies of, the contents of this e-mail and/or any attachment to it. If this email is marked 'personal' Nomad Foods Europe Limited is not liable in any way for its content. E-mails are susceptible to alteration. Nomad Foods Europe Limited shall not be liable for the message if altered, changed or falsified. We try to ensure that our communications are free of viruses but do not accept responsibility for any loss or damage that viruses may cause. You should take your own steps to ensure that communications are free of viruses. Nomad Foods Europe Limited and its employees operate in compliance with the law. Any recommended selling price (RSP) is provided for guidance only. Retailers are free to set their own prices. Nomad Foods Europe Limited is a limited liability company registered in England and Wales, company registration number 5879466. Registered Office: No. 1 New Square, Bedfont Lakes Business Park, Feltham, Middlesex TW 14 8HA. From: Paul Maylunn <Paul.Maylunn@peterborough.gov.uk> Sent: 26 February 2024 14:20 To: Lau, Ming <ming.lau@nomadfoods.com>; Brand, Sandy <Sandra.Brand@nomadfoods.com> Subject: Aunt Bessie – Crispy Skin on Homestyle Chips (1.3kg bag) Foreign body complaint R 862110 CAUTION: This email originated from outside our organisation. Do not open attachments or click links, unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe. Dear Ming, Sandy, I hope you are well. Please find attached details of an alleged stone foreign body complaint from South Tyneside Council. The complainant is to take the item to the officer. There are photos with a scale; the stone appears to be 4mm across. Batch details are provided. Please would you provide the foreign body controls at the factory and detail where the factory is? Please would you provide stats on the incidence of foreign bodies at the site, including complaints and rejected from production if kept? Where production detects is there a feedback mechanism to earlier in the production process? There is quoted an Irish address, what is the UK address given? This complaint may already have been reported by Sainsbury’s as retailer since they refunded. Please let me know if you want to examine it. If you would provide details I will be able to respond to the officer, and I’ll be happy to discuss further with you, should you wish.

Subject: Protocolo 2778926 - BRF Claim
TextBody: Dear Isadora Nogueira , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014552. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Bath information: Lotcode : G08230520802 Production day : 21/02/2023 There is a complete Quality Assurance system in place and the principles of HACCP are applied. This includes a full monitoring system on the production line. The finished products themselves are sampled every 60 minutes and examined for quality, including length and slivers. Full records of these and all the other checks are maintained. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for this specific batch. We produced the product conform pre-defined limits. 07h58 Average during run Target >50mm 47.97 53.95 Target 60% by weight - Min 30% <25mm 1.46 1.69 Max 6% by weight Slivers 5 5.23 Max 30/1000g It's important to note that there will always be variations in production throughout the year due to the inherent nature of potatoes as a natural product. From a technical standpoint, we always strive to offer you the best possible product. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: [Request for confirmation] Claim Report 381154　[597 Agristo(ヘ゛ルキ゛ー)]
TextBody: Dear Kohei, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014526. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : C08232000733 Packaging day : 19/07/2023 It is unlikely that this foreign body came along with the potatoes, as this piece of cardboard seems quite undamaged or intact. If it had accompanied the potatoes, it would have been eliminated by the salt bath process. Additionally, the process water and the fryer would likely have altered the cardboard's structure. There are also no traces of coating or oil visible on the piece of cardboard. Upon reviewing the production data, we found that the product was initially produced and stored in bulk due to capacity reasons. The cardboard octabins have a plastic liner and cardboard lid. During the packaging process on 19/07/2023, the operator is responsible for inspecting the integrity of the bulk, plastic, and pallet both before and after tipping the product into the packaging line. Unfortunately, it appears that on this occasion, the inspection was not thorough enough, and during the tipping process, a piece of the bulk cardboard box must have ended up in the final product. We will discuss this complaint in our next production meeting to emphasize the need for heightened vigilance among all team members. Q1. No sufficient human inspection of the bulk Q2. Yes Q3. The product does not traver over the optical sorter when packed from bulk.. it dit pas the optical sorter before it was packed in bulk. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Il copywriting è la disciplina che ti permette di scrivere testi emozionali e coinvolgenti in grado di persuadere e incoraggiare gli utenti e le persone a compiere un'azione concreta. I vantaggi offerti da un'attività di copywriting seria e professionale sono molteplici: ☑️ maggiore coinvolgimento da parte del pubblico; ☑️ potenziamento dell'identità e della comunicazione aziendali; ☑️ miglioramento della brand reputation; ☑️ aumento del posizionamento su Google; ☑️ incremento delle conversioni e fidelizzazione del cliente. Un testo ben confezionato ti consente di farti trovare dal tuo target, influenzare le decisioni d'acquisto dei tuoi potenziali clienti e migliorare la tua reputation aziendale. In Altrarete possiamo aiutarti a creare contenuti efficaci, persuasivi e SEO oriented per il tuo sito, il blog aziendale, i social, le newsletter e molto altro ancora. Dai voce alla tua azienda! Subject: Urgent Request for Rosti Information - SAEAN GLOBAL
TextBody: Dear Pieter How are you doing? Hope everything is going well for you. I am resending this email to inquire for the 'Poly Acids Unsaturated'. Same as Cholesterol and Trans Fat, hope to hear information about this as well. Below is the same email as the last one. I am receiving an inquiry regarding the Rosti product, and it seems quit urgent for them to receive this information. Based on our assumption, we believe that fries should contain cholesterol and trans fat in its nutrition information. However, the received Rosti's information sheet doesn't show any remarks. The customer is wondering the reasoning behind it. Whether its gone because indicating these two nutrition isn't mandatory in Belgium or if its simply not there. Could you please write me an official letter with the signature of the personal explaining about the cholesterol and trans fat? They hope to know why its not written on the document. I know everyone is busy but this customer is hoping to receive a letter by tomorrow. Hope you could help. Thank you, Dino Kim. Subject: ALIMENTARIA HOSTELCO BARCELONA 2024
TextBody: Hello, I hope this email finds you well. My name is Liliia Salakhova. I would like to apply for the position of interpreter and sales representative at your booth during the ALIMENTARIA HOSTELCO BARCELONA 2024. I specialize in working at international trade shows and have experience in the food industry. If you are participating in other industry events, I would also like to apply to work there. I have previously worked as an interpreter, sales representative and BDM for various companies in the industry, including bakery, chocolate, vegan food, coffee, wine, seafood, machinery, technologies, uniforms, water bottling and food packaging. Additionally, I possess experience within the restaurant sector, having collaborated with a prestigious restaurateur and a real estate investment company specializing in properties for restaurants. Furthermore, I have gained valuable experience working at trade fairs, including Gastronomic Forum Barcelona 2022, Barcelona Wine Week 2023, Seafood Global (2022, 2023), Advanced Manufacturing 2023, Hispack (packaging expo), In-cosmetics Global (I worked with a chemical company for both cosmetics and the food sector) and others. My professional expertise includes providing interpretation services in Spanish, English, and Russian across a variety of settings, including exhibitions, negotiations, conferences, seminars, medical facilities, legal institutions, and government visits. Also I can understand Italian and Portuguese. In addition to my interpretation skills, I have a strong track record in sales and business development across different sectors, showcasing my adaptability and ability to excel in diverse environments. I possess a high level of proficiency in generating leads and ensuring repeat business. My working method is as follows: you present your product to me, and I proceed to memorize the presentation. Next, we go over frequently asked questions, and I memorize the corresponding answers. This way, throughout the course of the trade show, I will act as your sales representative in multiple languages. My responsibilities include welcoming visitors, presenting the company, answering their questions, and collecting contacts of potential partners. Additionally, I will carry out detailed observations of their needs, which will facilitate post-trade show follow-up. I have worked at both large booths with well-known companies, like the one at the ISE event that was visited by the King of Spain, and small booths with just 1-2 people. In the smaller booths, I took on multiple roles, such as sales representative, export manager, PR, Business Development Manager, interpreter, and booth manager. I am adept at multitasking and am highly proactive. With my contributions, you can expect a significant boost in sales after this event. I can provide a plethora of recommendations from the companies I've worked with at various international trade shows. Furthermore, I have experience independently representing companies at trade shows. For instance, during Barcelona's largest event, the Mobile World Congress 2023, I was hired by a company invited by the UN to represent them. I have a wide-reaching network of contacts across various sectors, including catering services, coffee machines, baristas, hostesses, photographers, and booth builders. Thanks to my friendly disposition and proactive approach, I excel in customer service and networking. I am confident in my ability to attract a substantial number of potential clients for your company at this trade show. Moreover, I am open to traveling, making me an ideal candidate for future events. Typically, companies that partner with me secure my services a year in advance for all the global trade shows they participate in. I am already booked for several trade shows in 2024, spanning locations such as Spain, Portugal, France, UAE, UK, Hungary, Italy, Thailand, Malta and others. Please find my CV attached.

Subject: FW: complaints
TextBody: Hi Łukasz, Thank you very much for your detailed feedback below. This is valuable to us, as this allows us to improve our overall quality and service. We understand that you need to build trust in our Maestro brand with your customers and that quality is of utmost importance to your customers. Please be assured that we take your claim seriously and that we are committed to find a solution that works for all parties involved. In order to settle this unfortunate situation, we will issue a credit note for the 288 bags of the Maestro straight cut fries 14/14 that are claimed to be of poor quality. My colleague, @Dieter Callewaert <mailto:Dieter.Callewaert@agristo.com> , will send you the credit note shortly. We will not collect these 288 bags, you or your customers can simply dispose them. Therefore, there is no need for you to collect the goods from your customer. Viewing our production process, quality checks and high overall quality standards, we are convinced this was an isolated case. If your customers require further information, you can explain them what I explained in my e-mail of the 20th of February below. The fact that you didn’t receive any further complaints is also an evidence that this was an isolated case and the overall quality of our products is impeccable. We appreciate your request for a discount on the next pallet, however, we believe that by issuing a credit note for the 288 bags, we have settled this claim. Moreover, we believe in the quality and value of our products, and our price reflects the high standard we maintain. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and hope that with this settlement we can continue to grow our business together.

Subject: Enquiry - FOA Mr. Ward: Specialized Solutions for Frozen/Chilled and General Goods with FreightX
TextBody: Dear Mr. Ward, I hope this message finds you well. My name is Paul, and I represent FreightX, a company primarily focused on optimizing logistics for frozen/chilled goods, while also catering to the needs of general merchandise. We pride ourselves on our extensive network of over 100 fully vetted drivers across Europe, ensuring reliability, efficiency, and cost-effectiveness in meeting our clients' diverse shipping needs. I understand the value of establishing and maintaining strong, productive relationships with logistics providers. It's possible you're currently satisfied with your logistics arrangements. However, at FreightX, we believe in the power of options and the importance of knowing you have the best solution tailored to your specific needs. With that in mind, I'd like to offer you a brief overview of how our services could complement or enhance your current logistics strategy, potentially unlocking greater efficiencies and cost savings for your operations: Specialized Expertise in Frozen/Chilled: Tailored logistics solutions that ensure your products are transported under optimal conditions, preserving quality and compliance. Extensive, Vetted Driver Network: Access to a broad network of professional drivers across Europe, offering scalability and flexibility to meet your shipping demands. Cost-Efficient and Reliable Shipping Solutions: Competitive pricing combined with our commitment to reliability and transparency, aiming to provide the best value for your logistics spend. I would be honoured to discuss how FreightX can specifically address the logistics challenges you face and explore potential areas for collaboration. If you're open to it, could we schedule a time for a brief call or meeting to dive deeper into your current logistics setup and how we might be able to bring value to your operations? Thank you for considering FreightX as a potential partner in your logistics and shipping endeavors. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you and hopefully work together to achieve your logistics goals.

Subject: Urgent Request for Rosti Information - SAEAN GLOBAL
TextBody: Dear Pieter How are you doing? Hope everything is going well for you. I am receiving an inquiry regarding the Rosti product, and it seems quit urgent for them to receive this information. Based on our assumption, we believe that fries should contain cholesterol and trans fat in its nutrition information. However, the received Rosti's information sheet doesn't show any remarks. The customer is wondering the reasoning behind it. Whether its gone because indicating these two nutrition isn't mandatory in Belgium or if its simply not there. Could you please write me an official letter with the signature of the personal explaining about the cholesterol and trans fat? They hope to know why its not written on the document. I know everyone is busy but this customer is hoping to receive a letter by tomorrow. Hope you could help. Thank you, Dino Kim. [https://mail.naver.com/readReceipt/notify/?img=efnmMre516twaAmsKq2lK6uZpop4az3SKA%2BCa6p0ax2XFx2qMqMrMqp4aAv%2FtzFXp6UmKxE5W4d5W4pZMLlGWq%2FsbrkZ%2B40opEICpXiGbX3T74FTWt%3D%3D.gif]

Subject: Current production lead time
TextBody: Hi Cassie, Thank you for your email. The situation in the Red Sea is making global shipping a challenge indeed. Our lead times have remained the same: we need to count for a minimum of 4 weeks between reception of the order and cargo ready date. To be on the safe side, I would recommend counting 6 weeks of lead time. Melissa at Remant will be able to help you with the current transit times on the water. I think that reefer availability is becoming an issue with some carriers now as well, as the reefer cycle is heavily disturbed at the moment.

Subject: FW: ICA Kundservice CSTASK0020933 - Sötpotatis Strips  --
TextBody: Dear Rebecca , Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We have promptly registered it in our system under ticket number 00014342. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : G26233140718 Production day : 10/11/2023 Our production process includes numerous physical and optical elimination steps for foreign objects. Agristo continually invests in implementing best practice technical solutions to prevent foreign objects. First potatoes go through a stone remover, which operates on centrifugal forces to eliminate objects heavier than potatoes. Following the stone remover, there is a water bath to remove floating particles, and a hedgehog conveyor to eliminate leafage. The leafage adheres to the pins on the conveyor and is removed in this manner. After peeling and washing, the potatoes pass through an optical sorter to eliminate foreign objects. This is accomplished using a color camera, which identifies foreign bodies, green potatoes, and those with severe defects and diseases, rejecting them through a mechanical system. Subsequently, the potatoes are conveyed to the production line for cutting, and they undergo inspection for black parts by a second optical sorter. Any defects are rejected using compressed air. Additionally, small, dark-colored foreign bodies are detected and eliminated.. These initial steps are designed to eliminate foreign bodies from the potatoes. Unfortunately, this stone managed to evade these rejection steps. Based on the provided pictures, we can conclude that the stone likely originated from the initial feed of potatoes. Based on the lotcode, we have conducted a thorough investigation into our production records and quality documents for the specific batch. No remarks were made. We are confident that this complaint is not widespread. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Subject: FW: Private Brands Issue - hair
TextBody: Dear, Thank you for informing us about the below, we have promptly registered it in our system . We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : D08 23 284 20:32 Production day : 11/10/2023 In all our production plants we have very stringent hygiene rules and measurements. All visitors, operators or working personnel have to wear hair nets and protective clothing. Also men with beards have to wear a beard net. We have a procedure for how we have to put these on: first the hair and beard net have to be put on, afterwards the protective clothing, this is to avoid having hair on the protective clothing. As the seasoned shredded potatoes have very few manual handlings and there is no personal with pink hair in the production area, we feel confident to say that it is very unlikely that this hair would have found its origin in our premises. We apologize for any inconvenience that you may have suffered. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us again.

Dear Khaled Ali, After you recent visit to our booth in Gulfood 2024, we would like to thank you for your interest in our company, products and services. We have discussed your visit internally and have come to the decision that we will not be able to work with intermediaries such as yourself. At Agristo we have decided to focus on working directly with end buyers, as we believe this will provide the best value to our customers and ultimately drive the success of our business. The reason behind this decision is that by working directly with the end buyers we can have a better understanding of the market trends and have more control over the prices and terms of the transactions. This will also allow us to have a direct relationship with our customers which we believe will be beneficial for both parties. We would like to thank you for your interest in working with us and hope that you understand our decision.

Subject: sollicitation C&O /AGRISTO
TextBody: Bonjour, Nous avons un intérêt important pour votre produit : FRITE EVER CRRISP 4x2,5Kg (voir photos en attachement) volume 22 palettes /par 15jours ou 30jours 2 possibilité de livraison et tarif : soit livraison RUNGIS - FRANCE soit livraison DUBAI - EMIRATS ARABES UNIS Merci de nous établir votre meilleure offre de prix pour les 2 possibilité de livraison ainsi que les délais. Nous avons pu découvrir certains de vos produits et souhaiterions en découvrir davantage et sélectionner, ensemble, les produits et les tarifs qui nous conviendraient le mieux pour nos commandes à venir. Grossiste en restauration, nous sommes situés au Marché International de Rungis, au plus près des acteurs et des consommateurs professionnels de la restauration. Fort de nos années d'expérience et dans le cadre de notre développement, nous sommes à la recherche de nouveaux partenaires afin de répondre aux demandes exigeantes de nos clients et conquérir de nouveaux marchés. Dans l'attente de votre retour Cordialement Société CONSULTING & ORGANISATION Matthieu +33 6 84 50 9999 hercy.matthieu@outlook.fr

Dear Mohamed Elbehery, After you recent visit to our booth in Gulfood 2024, we would like to thank you for your interest in our company, products and services. Subject: Tesco hash browns 750g - 600157 - 2286619 - Underfill
TextBody: Dear Gabriella, Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention, we have promptly registered it in our system. We are sorry to hear that your customer was not satisfied with the quality of this batch. The quality of our products is of utmost importance to us and we are committed to resolving this matter. Batch information: Lotcode : Unknown Packaging day : Unknown Our high-tech packaging lines are automatically controlled to ensure the precise net weight per bag, in accordance with EU standards. As part of the packaging process, each packaging line is equipped with two check weighers. One weigher checks the weight of each individual bag, while the other verifies the weight of each filled carton (trade unit). If a bag or carton is underweight, it is automatically rejected. Additionally, the packaging operators check the proper functioning of the check weigher during each shift. The average weight of the bags is also monitored for compliance, and all data from the packaging line (Garvens) is automatically recorded. As we don't have the lotcode available, we have not been able to conduct traceability checks and the corresponding Garvens report for this packaging run. However, we can confirm that the weight of the bag is checked upon the total weight of the bag, not the number of pieces in the bag. As a hash brown may weigh between 49 and 55g, It is possible that there are not exactly 15 pcs in the bag. Can the customer confirm that the weight of the bag was 750g (+/- 15-30g as per European regulations)?

Subject: Autoreply
TextBody: Beste leverancier, Uw e-mail met factuur in bijlage is goed ontvangen. Deze e-mails worden niet persoonlijk gelezen. Alle facturen in PDF-formaat worden automatisch verwerkt in ons facturatiesysteem. Indien u zich houdt aan onderstaande richtlijnen dan zal de verwerking vlot verlopen: * 1 factuur is 1 PDF * Een e-mail kan perfect meerdere facturen (meerdere PDF’en) bevatten. * Vermelding van ons bestellingsnummer of het emailadres van de Agristo besteller op elke factuur. * Bijlagen kunnen meegestuurd worden op volgende manieren: * Samen in 1 PDF (factuur + bijlagen) * Extra in een ander format dan PDF zoals Excel, Word, …. * Een 2de maal doorsturen van uw factuur (via de post of via mail) is niet nodig en zal mogelijks vertraging veroorzaken bij de verwerking. Alle andere communicatie met betrekking tot facturen (vragen, betalingsherinnering, …) kan via e-mail naar "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" of via telefonisch contact met onze afdeling Finance. Gelieve geen reply uit te voeren op deze e-mail. Met vriendelijke groeten, Finance Agristo ***English**** Dear supplier, Your email with the invoice attached was well received. Please be aware that these emails will not be read personally. All invoices in PDF format are automatically processed in our invoicing system. If you take into account the guidelines below, the processing will run smoothly: * 1 invoice is 1 PDF * An email can perfectly contain multiple invoices (that is multiple PDFs). * Mention our order number or the email address of the Agristo purchaser on each invoice. * Attachments can be sent along in the following ways: * Together in the same PDF (invoice + attachments) * Extra in a different format than PDF such as Excel, Word, ... * A second transmission of your invoice (by post or by e-mail) is not necessary and may cause delays in the processing. All other communication related to invoices (questions, payment reminder, ...), please contact our Finance department by e-mail to "Agristo.Finance@agristo.com" or by telephoning to this department. Please do not reply to this e-mail. With
