Subject: Project Funding Partnership
TextBody: Hello Sir, Hope you are doing great? I'm Mr. Hamza M. Fontayne, a Freelance Consultant Associated with Petro Consultant of the Netherlands. I help to facilitate between individuals/project owners who have viable projects that need financing. We would like to know whether you are looking for a new Loan Investor OR JV Partnership Investor to fund your projects. This is the big opportunity for you 2024 projects funding program is on. These projects are open for all companies around the world, if you have intention to participate in the process, please confirm your interest. The terms/conditions 2.5% interest rate per year, time duration is 10 years and a 1 year grace period. If you intend to borrow for your business/projects. Contact us with your project plan for more information about this offer. If so, Let us have your project plan and your contact WhatsApp number to discuss further. I look forward to reading from you about projects and possible collaborations. All the best, Mr. Hamza M. Fontayne . e-MAIL: n.h@pcondbv.com<mailto:n.h@pcondbv.com>

We are looking for food stocks! Do you have any of these kinds of products? • products with short best before date (BBD) • products with packaging out of date • overstock and overproduction • remaining stocks, returned goods • any products which can't sell or cause you some problems! We are also interested in old production machines! Our service includes: • prepayment • self pick up • 100% controlled sale! We sell only in allowed countries and channels! Also products by private labels like LIDL, ALDI, NETTO, EDEKA etc. You are welcome to forward our contact details to your partners! -- Jewgeni Kazatchkov (director) Mob. +49 163 2555 332 Sybelstr. 67, 10629 Berlin Dennis Ivanchenko Mob. +36 70 741 4760 Fő u. 80, 1027 Budapest Diana Ivanchenko Mob. +38 093 353 2620 Smilanska 44, 18000 Cherkasy Food-Stock St.Nr. 13/376/00498 USt-IdNr. Los interesados pueden ejercitar sus derechos de acceso, rectificación, supresión, oposición, limitación al tratamiento, oposición a la adopción de decisiones automatizadas y portabilidad, revocación del consentimiento otorgado en relación con los tratamientos basados en el mismo, dirigiéndose por escrito a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada o en aquella que la sustituya y se comunique en el Registro General de Protección de Datos, o enviando un mail a la siguiente dirección delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es <mailto:delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es> , adjuntando cualquiera que se a la vía de ejercicio de los derechos, fotocopia del D.N.I. La inclusión en esta comunicación de datos personales de terceros, queda limitada a datos actuales y veraces y requiere con carácter previo informar y solicitar el consentimiento a dichos terceros para el tratamiento de sus datos conforme los extremos contenidos en el presente aviso. Con el fin de mantener los datos actualizados, los interesados pueden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en la dirección indicada cualquier variación de sus datos, así como el cese de su actividad en la entidad a la que pertenecen. - Este missatge i els documents que, si és el cas, porte annexos, poden contindre informació confidencial. Per això, s'informa a qui el reba per error que la informació continguda en el mateix és reservada i el seu ús no autoritzat està prohibit legalment, pel que en este cas li preguem que ens ho comunique per la mateixa via, s'abstinga de realitzar còpies del missatge o remetre'l o entregar-lo a una altra persona, procedint a esborrar-lo immediatament. "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." amb domicili en l'Av. Alginet, núm. 1, 46460, Silla (València <https://protect.checkpoint.com/v2/___https://maps.google.com/?q=Av.+Alginet,+n%C3%BAm.+1,+46460,+Silla+(Val%C3%A8ncia&entry=gmail&source=g___.YzJlOmFncmlzdG86YzpvOjZjNzQ3MTc4YjkyOTFiMTQ1ZTg0OWNjYWE5ZTA2ZmVlOjY6MTI1MDo0OTJmYmRmZmU5ODRkNGMzOTE5YWQyOGZmMTc3NDEwMjcyNzBmZTkyNTY5ZmIyMDlkM2ViZDE1ODExNjMwZDM2Omg6Rg> ) és responsable d'un tractament en què són emmagatzemats les dades personals contingudes en esta comunicació a fi de gestionar les comunicacions electròniques, emmagatzemar els correus en l'històric de comunicacions i, si fóra necessari monitoritzar el missatge i arxius adjunts per motius de seguretat i prevenció de virus. Així mateix, tals dades i altres de contacte que l'interessat haja proporcionat a través de la seua targeta de visita o altres mitjans, seran inclosos en el directori de contactes de l'entitat per a manteniment de la relació comercial. Els interessats poden exercitar els seus drets d'accés, rectificació, supressió i oposició, limitació al tractament, oposició a l´adopció de decisions automatitzades i portabilitat, revocació del consentiment atorgat en relació amb els tractaments basat en el mateix, dirigint-se per escrit a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada o en aquella que la substituïsca i es comunique en el Registre General de Protecció de Dades, o enviant un mail a la següent adreça delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es <mailto:delegadoprotecciondatosconsum@consum.es> , adjuntant qualsevol que siga la via d´exercici dels drets, fotocòpia del D.N.I. La inclusió en esta comunicació de dades personals de tercers, queda limitada a dades actuals i veraces i requerix amb caràcter previ informar i sol·licitar el consentiment a dits tercers per al tractament de les seues dades conforme els extrems continguts en el present avís. A fi de mantindre les dades actualitzades, els interessats poden comunicar a "CONSUM, S.COOP.V." en l'adreça indicada qualsevol variació de les seues dades, així com el cessament de la seua activitat en l'entitat a qual pertanyen.

Subject: Product Damage
TextBody: Hello Hyunjin In the meantime I was able to have a look at the pictures you’ve send regarding the damaged packaging. I noticed they were are applicable to the Crinkle Cut Chips. I have informed the concerned production plant - Agristo Harelbeke - to pay extra attention during the next packaging run. Please keep us informed so we can follow-up the progress.

Subject: Réclamation AC 118/2024
TextBody: Bonjour, Effectivement, il y a eu confusion. Voici le BL ci-joint correspondant aux lots en question de la réclamation. Pour donner suite à vos réponses : * Non, nous n’avons jamais traité ce produit * Les pommes dauphines ont été écartées et mises dans ce bac à part du reste de la matière afin de les isoler * Nous ne traitons pas les pommes dauphines, nous n’en utilisons pas dans nos plats préparés En espérant avoir répondu à vos questions. Mathilde FRIOUX Pour Marine CATHERIN Assistante Qualité Fournisseurs De : Françoise De Vrieze <francoise.devrieze@agristo.com> Envoyé : mardi 20 février 2024 16:29 À : Marine CATHERIN <marine.catherin@mousquetaires.com>; Melanie JEULAND-VALLEE <melanie.jeuland-vallee@mousquetaires.com> Objet : RE: Réclamation AC 118/2024 Bonjour, Je vous remercie pour les nouveaux détails de cette plainte. Après avoir discuté de cette plainte en interne, nous avons eu d'autres questions à ce sujet Pouvez-vous nous confirmer qu'il s'agit bien du lot code DB123310 et non d'autres lots: DB124019, DB124005, DB124006. En effet, nous avons également reçu des scans de ces lots. En effet, pour nous, le code de lot est crucial pour mener à bien nos recherches. Avez-vous déjà tout traité de ce produit au cas où ? Nous constatons que le bac dans lequel les dauphines ont été trouvées n'est pas un bac Agristo. Déversez-vous notre purée (provenant des octabins) dans ces bacs pour l'utiliser dans votre processus ? Avez-vous remarqué la présence des dauphines parce que vous en faites des plats préparés ? Subject: B&A Pasen 2024
TextBody: Goedemiddag, Ik heb uw bestel- en afleverschema bekeken. Wij zijn enkel gesloten op Pasen en op Paasmaandag (1 april). De andere dagen zijn wij open om te laden. Ik voorzie dan ook geen problemen met uw bestel- en afleverschema. Met vriendelijke groeten, Zoë Zoë Feys Customer Service Agristo nv P +32 56 54 11 67 --------------- Original Message --------------- From: Reijbroek, Manon [manon.reijbroek@jumbo.com] Sent: 23/02/2024 10:26 To: Zoe.Feys@agristo.com Cc: rein.reurekas@jumbo.com Subject: B&A Pasen 2024 Geachte relatie, De Paasdagen zijn in zicht en vanuit Forecasting & Replenishment Jumbo zijn we druk bezig met de voorbereidingen. Om er ook dit jaar weer een gezamenlijk succes van te maken hebben we nadrukkelijk uw hulp nodig. De extra volumes vragen ons allen om extra inzet en flexibiliteit t.o.v. de normale bestel- en afleverschema’s. Om de beschikbaarheid van artikelen aan onze winkels te garanderen, maar ook opstoppingen en wachttijden bij onze DCs te voorkomen streven we naar een goede spreiding van de leveringen; het kan dus zijn dat we extra levermomenten van u vragen. Ook op 2e Paasdag zijn wij geopend voor ontvangst. Graag vernemen we voor Vrijdag 01/03 of hier eventueel gegronde afwijkingen op zijn. Wij rekenen op uw flexibiliteit en medewerking en gaan er van uit dat we met gezamenlijke inzet tot een succesvolle Paas periode komen. Dear partner, Easter is coming closer and within Forecasting & Replenishment we are intensively working on preparations. To make it a collaborative success this year we need your help. The extra volume these days asks for extra effort and flexibility in comparison with the regular ordering and delivery schedule. To ensure the in-store availability of our articles, but also to reduce waiting times at our distribution centers, we strive to a good dispersion of deliveries. It could be that we ask for extra delivery moments of you. We are opened for delivery on Easter Monday. We would like to know before Friday 01/03 if there are anomalies on the regular delivery schedule. We count on your flexibility and co-operation and assume that with collaborative effort this Easter period will be a success. Met vriendelijke groet /

Dear Vikram Ugale, After you recent visit to our booth in Gulfood 2024, we would like to thank you for your interest in our company, products and services. We have discussed your visit internally and would like to ask you some more questions. I've understood that you are looking for our speciality products, but I could not find and estimated volume. Would it be possible to provide me with an estimated vulome in ton/year? Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need more information, have any questions, or wish to discuss certain matters.

Subject: Invoices after loading/ tracking
TextBody: Dear Jack, We have carried out an update to our system and I was wondering whether you would be interested to receive the invoices immediately after loading. This way, you know that an order has been loaded and you will receive an automated mail with the invoice containing the shipping details. Please note that the mails with the vessel info will still be sent automatically a few days / weeks before loading. If you are interested in receiving the invoices automatically after loading, please let me know and I will update our system accordingly.

Dear, Thank you for your email and your interest in our company. To evaluate your request, we want to get a better picture of your company. Could you inform us and give some detailed information regarding: Do you already purchase frozen (potato) products? What is your experience in this field? If yes, with what brands or companies do you already work? Why do you wish to change? What volumes of fries per SKU do you do annually? Do you have your own distribution channel or partners? And warehouses? Could you provide me some more information concerning your company? Do you have a website? What is your market strategy? Who are your customers? If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. With

Subject: NOMAD FOODS EUROPE - NOTIFICATION OF COMPLAINT - Case Number: 00452502    [ ref:!00D1t0uJan.!500Vg03XcUe:ref ]
TextBody: Hello, We are sorry to read that your customer seems to have found a piece of metal (screw) in the Belviva Mini Croquettes. Based on the lotcode, we can link the following production batch: Lot: D02 23 299 0255 Production site: Agristo Nazareth Production batch: 1032820 Packaging batch: 1302121152 , packaging line 02 Date: 26/10/2023, at 02h55 As already indicated before, you know our factory is equipped with the latest technologies to keep foreign objects out of our production. A HACCP plan has been set up for this purpose. On this basis, attached you can find the metal detection checks of the concerned production. Around the time of your complaint, the good functioning of the metal detectors have been checked around 02h19 and 03h16 (marked in green). Everything has been compliant, no metal has been found during this production. At this point is is also not clear if the piece of metal has been found inside the product or loose in the pack. It would almost be impossible for the screw to be found inside the Mini Croquette, as the mash passes a sieve (max. 1.2 mm) . This screw would certainly have been blocked. Did the customer bake these croquettes in the oven? Is this screw possibly a piece from it’s oven? Based on the above investigation, at this point we are not able to find the possible root cause of this incident. To be able to investigate this further, we would like to receive the actual piece of metal at the factory. Could you please sent it to the below address, with mention of the ticket ID 14607: Agristo Nazareth, Att. Inez Aerts Venecoweg 12 9810 Nazareth After receipt, we can test the piece on the concerned packaging line and see if it would have been eliminated by our metal detectors. If you in the meantime have any other concerns or questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our sincere apologies,

Subject: Residual / Redundant / Surplus stock
TextBody: Hi There, I sent an introductory email yesterday. I have just been informed that we are currently doing business with Clarebout Potatoes and are visiting them in a few weeks. If you interested in talking more about a what we might be able to to for Agristo, we would be very happy to come and visit you whilst we are in Belgium. Please let us know if that would be of interest. Many thanks, Kim Kim North Jumbo Commodities Limited Milroy House, Sayers Lane, Tenterden, Kent TN30 6BW T +44 (0)1580 765 777 M +44 (0) 7891 717 061 On 26 Feb 2024, at 15:56, Kim Wright <kim@jumbocommodities.co.uk<mailto:kim@jumbocommodities.co.uk>> wrote: Hi There, Hope you’re well. I got your details from the Anuga Trade Fair Exhibitor List as YBY was an exhibitor. I would like to introduce Jumbo Commodities to you and see if we might be of interest to you. At Jumbo Commodities Ltd and we are continually looking to purchase surplus / redundant residual stocks. Whether it is frozen, dried, or ambient, short dated, or out of date, any non food, if you have a parcel of products sitting in the corner of your warehouse taking up space or costing you money, we’ll almost certainly be able to find a home for it. We’re quick to inspect and agree a deal before we pay and will then send in our own transport to collect. With the ever increasing costs associated with the disposal of unwanted products, we're often able to realise some value for you instead, or at least move it on. We also work with a large, fully accredited waste management company if you have items that need to be disposed of in a controlled manner. With a large network of customers all over the world, we can even transport brand sensitive products to retails zones that will not compromise the brand. We can provide full stripping, re-packaging and re-labelling services too for both ambient and frozen product. Over the past 20 years we’ve developed some interesting clients and we love the challenge of finding a home for even the most unusual products. If the above is of interest to you and you think we could some business with Agristo please do get in touch. If you have any surplus stock lists to share, we would love to take a look. I look forward to hearing from you. Many thanks, Kim Kim North Jumbo Commodities Limited Milroy House, Sayers Lane, Tenterden, Kent TN30 6BW, UK T +44 (0)1580 765 777 M +44 (0) 7891 717 061
